title: Should Cannabis Genome DAO Own A Lab?
body:
## Web3 Is About Aligning Incentives

We think the genomic testing world could use a little more transparency and emphasis on the rights of individuals to control their data. This initiative would make Cannabis Genome DAO the first digital cooperative to maintain an ownership stake in a physical laboratory. As such, Cannabis Genome DAO would be granted full rights of a member of the company with access to financial reporting and an ability to ensure that the fidelity and transparency of laboratory practices are maintained. The alignment of incentives and governance rights between a community that benefits from using the laboratory, with the governance and incentives of the laboratory operations itself, directly benefits the community and users of the laboratories services.

## Overview of Proposed Crowdfund

Funding would go toward purchasing a membership interest in Delta Leaf, which is currently undergoing equity fundraising in pursuit of a traditional VC investment or strategic partnership from another organization. This provides the opportunity for Cannabis Genome DAO to fill that need. Funding from the sale of membership interest in Delta Leaf would be used for improving and expanding their services. These services include an upgrade to the Delta Leaf web app that would enable users to manage their laboratory results using self-custodial web3 wallets with the option to publish directly to the data marketplace being developed by Cannabis Genome DAO. Governance of Delta Leaf would be aligned with the mission and values of Cannabis Genome DAO because members of the latter would exert a significant amount of direct control over the operations of the former.

The crowdfund would be hosted here on Mirror and structured as a sale of a collection of tiered NFT editions. More information below.

* [Cannabis Genome DAO](https://cannabisgeno.me) (“CGD”) would purchase a 20% membership interest in [Delta Leaf Laboratories LLC](https://deltaleaflabs.com) (“Delta Leaf”), a California Limited Liability Corporation.
* Cannabis Genome DAO (“CGD") is a "[nonprofit association](https://ipfs//bafybeifzhrfh47zq743j35hq7v6lwmoqizzj665hwp7zzoqig6abveog6i/?filename=Delaware_UNA_Agreement_-_CGD.pdf)" under the Delaware Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act, Del. Code Ann. Tit. 6, §§ 1901-1916. CGD is not intended to be, and shall not be deemed to be, a partnership.
* Governance of the CGD’s membership interest in Delta Leaf would be managed through the distribution of DLL tokens to members of CGD who contribute to this fundraiser.
* The total DLL token supply would exclusively distribute governance rights to CGD members and does not distribute ownership right in Delta Leaf to individual members of CGD.
* DLL tokens would not, and will not, represent any financial claim by individual CGD members to potential profit or obligation to potential losses incurred by CGD while CGD is acting as a member of Delta Leaf.
* CGD and the CGD treasury would incur all financial profit and loss related to membership of CGD in Delta Leaf. The proceeds of this crowdfund will be sent to the CGD community multi-sig for the explicit purpose of completing the purchase of a membership interest in Delta Leaf as described herein.

![Felipe's cousin Isaac made this graphic years ago.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/D9MgsIfEXNqBfUuhtGwnJ.png?height=1440&width=2560)

## DLL Token Allocations

Governance of Delta Leaf comprises a subset of the proposed activities encompassed by the [CGD Community Hyperthesis](https://docs.google.com/document/d/182fZ2WIQCL15O0TbQmkaJFM8tci06czuuqTMzBl_-zs/edit?usp=sharing). Therefore, the token allocation will primarily be distributed directly to participants in the crowdfunding campaign with only 20% being reserved for community management by CGD itself. This will decentralize governance directly to financial supporters while aligning them with the remaining CGD community who does not participate in the crowdfunding campaign or joins the community later after the campaign ends. Further, an additional 10% will be reserved for incentivizing the ongoing development of infrastructure for the regenerative crypto-economic system proposed in the CGD Community Hyperthesis. This third portion will align the potential success of this crowdfund with the CGD ecosystem in the short term.

* 70% of the DLL token supply will be allocated directly to CGD members who contribute to the fundraiser.
* 20% of the DLL token supply will be reserved in the CGD treasury and managed by a community multi-sig wallet.
  * Multi-sig address: 0xb39EB13E9B69809ed938842D5Ea1A89a97787315
* 10% of the DLL token supply will be sent to a separate multi-sig wallet to be used exclusively for incentivizing the development of CSAT token smart contracts and a custom front-end for CannaData.Market.
  * Multi-sig address: 0x99A05055820f8c4794879B2617b520513C7DFca1

## Who Are The Members of Delta Leaf?

* [Elijah](https://www.linkedin.com/in/elijahspina/) - 80%
* [Felipe](https://www.linkedin.com/in/felipe-infante/) - 19%
* [Edgar](https://www.linkedin.com/in/edgararodriguez/) - 1%

### The current agreement for restructuring Delta Leaf pending successful fundraising to finance legal costs is:

* Elijah -  80% (fully vested)
* Felipe - 4% (fully vested, handshake agreement with Elijah)
* [Michael](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michael-oboyle/) - 15% (unvested, original agreement lapsed with contingencies not met)
* [Saif](https://www.linkedin.com/in/saif-startupstudios/) - 0% (resigned, forfeiting claim to equity and reimbursement)
* Edgar - 0% (offer a buyout)
* 1% held in company escrow

### A revised proposal for restructuring Delta Leaf is:

* Elijah -  70% (fully vested)
* Felipe - 15% (5% fully vested, 10% unvested on 4yr term/1yr cliff)
* Michael - 15% (2.5% fully vested, 12.5% unvested on 4yr term/1yr cliff)
* Saif - 0% (offer a severance package)
* Edgar - 0% (offer a buyout)

### What it looks like if the crowdfund is successful:

* Elijah -  56% (fully vested)
* Felipe - 12% (4% fully vested, 8% unvested on 4yr term/1yr cliff)
* Michael - 12% (2% fully vested, 10% unvested on 4yr term/1yr cliff)
* Saif - 0% (offer a severance package)
* Edgar - 0% (offer a buyout)
* CGD - 20% (fully vested)

![Look at that face! (credit: Michael)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/68ZX1N_FPRjuV3yAU70QM.JPG?height=3024&width=3024)

## What Is Delta Leaf Actually Worth?

### Delta Leaf Income History

* 2018 \~ $12,600
* 2019 \~ $59,800
* 2020 \~ $212,000
* 2021 \~ $420,000
* 2022 \~ $150,000 YTD (raising capital to invest in lowering overhead and bolstering new revenue streams)

### Delta Leaf Assets

 1. A customer book of 1939 individuals
 2. An email subscriber list of 1965 addresses
 3. Internal research data for assay and product development
 4. Extensive and detailed standard operating procedures for a low-cost and high-throughput cannabis genomics laboratory
 5. A full laboratory with 12 BioRad (MJ Research) PCR machines, 1 BioRad iCycler iQ5 qPCR machine, four high-throughput gel rigs, multiple centrifuges, an autoclave, shaker, scale, laminar flow hood, and all other equipment required to perform basic molecular biology experiments and process large volumes of samples.
 6. Supplies to make \~15,000 DNA/RNA collection kits (current version)
 7. Infrastructure: website, extensive marketing collateral, HR, CRM automation, etc.
 8. 500 units of a prototype unreleased custom DNA/RNA collection kit compatible with automated sample processing machines
 9. Die-lines, artwork, assembly and use instructions for a line of custom-designed functional product packaging to facilitate shipping and processing of the prototype kits (list item #8)
10. UX/UI and database designs for a customer-facing app supporting SaaS data analysis services compatible with list items #8 and #9 (the app also doubles as an internal  workforce productivity app)
11. An IP-NFT demonstrating proof-of-concept for CRISPR gene editing in cannabis (and a couple of awesome ENS names)

[https://mirror.xyz/fuckmonsanto.eth/jr1KKbnIR0orWnlyb1-UuAkAyUPZk5NARqc0dxnc_o8](https://mirror.xyz/fuckmonsanto.eth/jr1KKbnIR0orWnlyb1-UuAkAyUPZk5NARqc0dxnc_o8)

## Estimated Use of Funds (minimum goal)

Minimuml crowdfunding goal is 100 ETH (currently \~$125,000 USD).

* Offer buyout to Edgar - $7,250
* Outstanding expenses - $10,000
* Legal restructuring and tokenization - $10,000
* HLVd Screening Reagents - $20,000
* Reagents for HLVd/LCV/CCV Multiplex Assay - $25,000
* Fingerprint Reagents - $5,000
* Payroll (3 months) - $30,000
* Rent (3 months) - $4,200
* Develop an Educational Course - $10,000

### CGD Educational Course

Delta Leaf will develop an online and in-person bootcamp course available at a discount for CGD members to teach basic molecular biology lab skills required to perform entry-level technical work in the cannabis industry. The online part of the course will instruct students in fundamental background knowledge through a combination of animations, live whiteboard demos, and slide presentations.

Students will be able to claim a non-transferrable NFT Certificate after completing learning assessments throughout the course and passing a final examination\*. Students holding the NFT Certificate will be eligible to enroll in a paid, small group, live training course held on-site at Delta Leaf Laboratories in Santa Barbara, CA.

*\*Note: a small number of NFT Certificates to enroll in the first cohort of the live training course will be sold as part of the crowdfund.*

![Like this, but, with more NFT.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IOZPM4flm_wmPo0inT0bc.png?height=500&width=500)

## Estimated Use of Funds (stretch goal)

Stretch goal is 500 ETH (currently \~$600,000 USD).

* Offer buyout to Edgar - $30,000
* CPA & Bookkeeper - $2,500
* Legal Restructuring and Tokenization - $10,000
* Outstanding Expenses - $10,000
* Nanodrop (for nucleic acid quantification) - $5,000
* HLVd and Fingerprint Reagents - $50,000
* Inventory for New Leaf Crush Kits and Packaging (100K kits) - $30,000
* Delta Leaf App MVP - $30,000
* Point-of-Grow Rapid Genetic Test Kits (new product dev) - $30,000
* Develop an Educational Course - $10,000
* Website redesign w/ new logo - $5,000
* TLD Registrations - $2,500
* Marketing for NEW BRANDING (website, kits, app, merch) - $7,500
* Swag and merchandise inventory - $7,500
* Payroll (1 year FT research scientist + PT processing staff) - $120,000
* Salary (1 year for 3 co-founders) - $150,000
* Customer support for phone/email (1 year) - $18,000
* Lab Rent (1 year) - $16,800
* Insurance (1yr) - $3,000

If you’re still reading, here’s a link to the [Delta Leaf operating agreement](https://drive.internxt.com/s/file/1a093b59b9e41df54425/ccdeec05c32f76621207aaff8702700607fa5e0c1b36e56eb2d6002d61840de2) for full 100% transparent details about what membership entails. Exhibit A is the portion that would be modified to reflect a change in membership interest. The link only allows for a specified number of downloads before it blocks access to the file, so, if you’re unable to see the file reach out to @flow_science on Twitter or Flowscience#7502 on the [Cannabis Genome DAO server](https://discord.gg/6Y6EMaQJAQ).

title: Pillheads // Summer Update #1
body:
True to the nature of interacting with the web3 ecosystem, our concept of time has been decimated yet again. The past 6 weeks simultaneously feel like a year and a blur at once. Looking back has consistently overwhelmed me with how much has happened in such a short time.

We’ve got a lot to get into, but I would like to preface this with a huge shoutout to our team, and to our community. After our initial mint did not go very well, we all had some concerns about what’s next. None of us gave up, and nobody stopped coming up with creative solutions and ideas. Our level of determination, ethos, and patience were all tested, and I feel that we came out with our souls intact, and our commitment reinforced.

And to be perfectly clear, by “we,” and “us,” I mean both our team and our community. This has been an amazing trip with intense highs and lows, and I can confidently say that we have all arrived at a really good place, all things considered. Bear or bull, we are making it happen.

## 01 // Numbers

Let’s get into what happened by starting with a quick timeline and some stats.

> **Launched mint // June 16**
>
> Total mints June 4: **631/6655**
>
> Total holders June 4: **237**

We went to mint and were not anywhere near happy with the outcome. See the article linked below for full details and how we approached things. **This is a personal letter from CFW:**

[https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/zmgC1VdTgXAcgl11eFDHj6C8xShdXtxZcMhKztaXhHI](https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/zmgC1VdTgXAcgl11eFDHj6C8xShdXtxZcMhKztaXhHI)


---

> **Refunds & Airdrops // July 9 & 10**
>
> All folks from previous mint received a 50% refund
>
> All OG Pillheads received stacked airdrops

Please see above link to **CFW’s personal letter** for details. Along with our project manager [Potadough](https://twitter.com/PotadoughNFT) (who is very active behind the scenes), we think it is very pertinent to note here that has observed our tradition of giving back to our holders, during a time when he is at a loss. While we were considering our next steps for mitigation and management, CFW was focused primarily on ensuring our ethos comes first.


---

> **Launched free mint // July 11**
>
> Total mints July 15: **6655/6655**
>
> Total holders July 15: **1,440+**

As of today (July 15th), our volume is just **north of 110 ETH**, and we have **1440 holders** and rising. While the floor does what the floor will do, our community has been absolutely amazing. Talk about “Up Only.” I have no accurate way of expressing how humbled and thankful we are for both our past and new members, and how impressed we are with the quality of engagement.

For those interested in seeing a holder/token breakdown, Etherscan has a great tool for this: [Pillheads Token Holders](https://etherscan.io/token/tokenholderchart/0x1b23d0f0f6dc3547c1b6945152acbfd6eaad85b0)

Some of the number we were seeing this week as our volume increased were also really fantastic. We ranked and trended visibly on Icy Tools, Opensea, and various other NFT trackers. In fact, on OS, we were ranking as high as 73rd among Ethereum projects on day of reveal.

![73rd spot in Ethereum Rankings on Opensea](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/f8k9gcedXa7tdRMpcQInu.png?height=170&width=480)

## 02 // Free Mint: What Happened?

We’ve gone over what happened during Free Mint on the 11th in Spaces, on Discord, and VC with various folks. We believe it’s important to lay all of this out clearly here, so that everybody can understand what went down during Free Mint Phases. We learned some big lessons, and hope that others can also benefit from learning about the chain of events that occurred.

The first thing to understand, is that our contracts were not designed for a free mint scenario. They were designed with quite a few things in mind. Here are the major ones:

* A 1st presale state for previous holders and Happylisted minters, at 0.1 eth.
* A 2nd presale state for winners of a Public Raffle (via premint.xyz), at 0.11 eth.
* A 3rd and final state for the public; all unminted tokens would be available to mint.
* The implementation of a “Soulbound” mechanic until public sale
* Gas optimization to a *massive* degree by using the erc720 standard
* 1 txn per wallet (multiple tokens minted at once, *once*)

**Read full article about this here:**

[https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/nrLfhxufyPaHVcI8DoA3fE1FiEP0Aw0YPMgM2ghSEj4](https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/nrLfhxufyPaHVcI8DoA3fE1FiEP0Aw0YPMgM2ghSEj4)

All of these tenets were a product of our belief in a fair and equitable approach to minting, based on unfair outcomes we had perceived from a massive number of other NFT projects. We also wanted to stay innovative, and bake in some bleeding edge mechanics. Coupled with the market conditions, our attempts at trying to stay ahead of the curve prevented us from minting out.

As per the [letter from CFW shared above](https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/zmgC1VdTgXAcgl11eFDHj6C8xShdXtxZcMhKztaXhHI), we decided to push on with a Free Mint.

At `10PM ET, July 11th` we opened up Free Mint Phase 1. This phase was intended to allow Previous CFW Collection Holders the ability to mint, *prior* to releasing a full on public mint phase. To ensure that past holders that had already minted during 1st presale in the previous mint could still mint (remember, 1 transaction per wallet) we had to get creative. So, the dev team came up with a creative solution to create a web2 based solution.

First, we set the contract to the public sale phase - the third state from the previous mint, wherein anybody can mint. We planned to rely on our contract and our website’s adherence to [EIP-712](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-712) in order to ward off users from minting on-contract via platforms like Etherscan and using a wallet-signed encrypted message to access our mint function. We then set the API endpoint to target the merkle tree that contained the presale 1 snapshot list of previous CFW holders (minus the Happylist wallets).

We then combined this approach with a web2 database to help enforce our two mint-per-holder allowances during that two-hour period. It verified holder status and kept track of how many they had minted so far. Having spun up a secure DB tracking mints, and a front end lock out for minting after reaching a 2x limit, we then *also* set a hardcoded integer max value for the minter, of “2.” This way, we would further enforce only requests for a maximum of 2 mints per txn from the website itself.

We thought this set of hoops would be able to obfuscate access well enough to last the two hours necessary, via gating the front-end. We realized that this is an exploitable system, but believed strongly that incentive to game the system was relatively low. This is the kind of sh\*t that makes web3 so secure for minting collectibles in the first place, in comparison to the circus we would have to navigate to build a comparably secure web2 application.

To quote Whitelights directly, this “bubble gum and duct tape solution” was the best option we had to mitigate problems. We truly believed that there wouldn’t be enough incentive for somebody to go out of their way to find an exploit in our system. Ironically, it’s in moments when you really don’t think something will happen, it will happen - *especially* when someone has the intent to take advantage of something valuable.

Which is ultimately what happened. A person (ask us about it on [Discord](https://discord.gg/pillheads)) that has developed a botting system for his “users,” essentially spotted a way to leverage the fact that public mint was turned on (unlimited mints). By reverse engineering the obfuscated EIP-712’s `r,s,v` values for a connecting wallet, they were able to mint repeatedly from our contract. By flipping the Metamask signed message for their wallet and copy-pasting it into Etherscan (or whatever they are using), they essentially went around the gated front end entirely.

Once we realized something was going on, we stopped mint. Some damage had already been done, and hundreds of tokens landed in botted wallets. Some of the folks utilizing the botting service turned out to be on our server all along, and the creator  even showed up in person. Folks even posted about how cool this app was on Twitter later. They were quite proud of this, and we were quite flustered. I will not go through the number of creative swear words I came up with during that time, while we proceeded to regroup as a team and figured out how to proceed.

Our three options to proceed at this point were:

1. Close mint, spend a week or two building a full on, beefy web2 application that would ultimately also be potentially exploitable, and cost us a lot of time.
2. Deploy remaining supply through a brand new contract in the next couple of days, which would result in a *second* collection on the chain.
3. Stay the course, and proceed with public mint at midnight.

As you all know now, we made a decision to go with option #3.

At this point, some weird, dark, cosmic humor kicks in for us. We had a version of the minter sitting ready for a full on public mint, in a github branch. It was tested, ready to go, and had nothing in it but the correct endpoints. Phase 1 was entirely removed, and ***only*** Phase 2 was in it. Zero gating, zero logic pointing at any other API endpoints.

At `12AM ET, July 12th` I pushed the Phase 2 branch live. And as the branch deployed, built, and verified, we watched in horror as Phase 2 did not show up, and found out the git branch had reverted *as well* as our hosting on AWS serving up a cached version of the minting site. Thankfully, the site *did* load the correct endpoint for the sale, and many individuals *were* able to mint at this time. By the time I had re-merged, re-pushed, and re-deployed an updated branch, the collection was sold out, and there was a vein in my forehead about to explode.

***Note:*** *the above technical breakdown of how things work and what came to pass is a collaborative effort of our dev team working together. [Whitelights](https://twitter.com/iamwhitelights) is our smart contract wizard, [0xDaemon](https://twitter.com/KingCryptoad) is our glue between web2 & web3, and I ([orbgasm](https://twitter.com/Orbtastic)) am the front end masher & dev team manager.*

![Token Distribution top 100 | src: Etherscan](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9Mf_SSdSyza4vTvrvhy0s.png?height=848&width=1986)

## 03 // Luck & Humanity

We got a *little* lucky here. That luck has everything to do with our current community, and how secondary sales were handled, as well as the enthusiastic minting that ensued. No one single wallet minted enough that we got royally f\*\*\*ed out of being able to have a healthy secondary market.

The bottom line is that public free mint went down, how a public free mint should go down, as soon as we opened it back up. We had healthy distribution of quantities, and folks immediately began to scoop tokens up on secondary at prices below 0.01 eth. Within hours, our floor was up from as low as 0.001 to 0.02 eth.

The humanity of the matter is simply that enough of you believed in CFW’s vision and our team, that we were able to arrive at this stage in the project. And once again, I cannot find the words to accurately express how insanely humbled we are by that. Our team is built entirely on trust and is held together with respect and integrity. We are all artists first and foremost, and the thing that brings us the most joy here, is that the entirety of CFW’s creation is now revealed and visible by the public.

To create art with the intention of sharing it with the world, and have it sit in a dark room never being seen, is a dark dream that fuels anxiety, and diminishes the human spirit that gave it life. Even if it is a creation that is not received well by the public eye, the fact that it has been perceived by others, is a form of resolution that is incomparable to any other.

I speak for the core team and our mods (and probably against CFW’s humble wishes), when I say our priority has been that CFW is treated with fairness and respect, and that his work and intentions with it, are seen by as many people as possible. The money we may or may not have made are afterthoughts compared to this.

[https://discord.gg/pillheads](https://discord.gg/pillheads)

## 04 // What’s Next?

Loaded question! We’ve clearly had to re-adjust our timelines and methodology here, as some of our ambitious goals need significant funding to actualize. I can, however, lay out some of our immediate and short-term goals.

1. Pushing Visibility - we are dedicated to getting our project seen, and our holder count increased. Stay tuned for social campaigns, and some larger discussions with multiple communities.
2. Extending on the prior point above: we begin reviewing and accepting project collaborations requests again. Be sure to get on our Discord and open a ticket `after July 18th`.
3. Rearranging the furniture - we will be updating/upgrading our Discord environment to a post-mint layout, and taking into account community suggestions and ideas. This will not be an overnight process, but rather a long and steady one.
4. Community Events - More Spaces & Stages, and other community events to keep the community connected and engaged.

As always, our Community Manager (and keeper of the ultimate ASMR voice) [unkfunk](https://twitter.com/unknownfunkhero) will be rolling out announcements to keep you all informed on all happenings. I encourage anybody reading this to tune into his ability to focus and keep things patiently on track when it comes to community affairs.

As we start getting things sorted, the Team will continue to revisit our Vision, and release information as we come to conclusions that we believe will benefit our community. Please stay tuned on both Twitter, and Discord for the most up to date information.

Thanks for being here!

title: 泰戈尔-飞鸟
body:
最喜欢的一首诗，双语，分享给大家

By plucking her petals you do not gather the beauty of the flower.

采撷花瓣得不到花的美丽。

The furthest distance in the world，Is not between life and death. But when I stand in front of you，Yet you don't know that I love you.

世界上最遥远的距离不是生与死，而是我就站在你面前，你却不知道我爱你。

Sorrow is hushed into peace in my heart like the evening among the silent trees.

忧愁在我心中沉寂平静，正如黄昏在寂静的林中。

I cannot choose the best. The best chooses me.

我不能选择那最好的，是那最好的选择我。

Stray birds of summer come to my window to sing and fly away.　And yellow leaves of autumn, which have no songs, flutter and fall there with a sigh.

夏天的飞鸟，飞到我窗前唱歌，又飞去了。 秋天的黄叶，他们没有什麼可唱的，只是叹息一声，飞落在那里。

Let life be beautiful like summer flowers and death like autumn leaves.

使生如夏花之绚烂，死如秋叶之静美。

We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us.

我们把世界看错了，反说它欺骗我们。

You smiled and talked to me of nothing and I felt that for this I had been waiting long.

你微微地笑着，不同我说什么话。而我觉得，为了这个，我已等待得久了。

If you shed tears when you miss the sun, you also miss the stars.

如果你因失去了太阳而流泪，那么你也失去了群星。

What you are you do not see, what you see is your shadow.

你看不见你自己，你所看见的只是你的影子。

The scabbard is content to be dull when it protects the keenness of the sword.

剑鞘保护剑的锋利，自己却满足於它自己的迟钝。

Roll.

I don't know if it's because the melon seeds are too sweet, they can always attract small mosquitoes and insects. Wen Ying had to fight insects when she got high on the melon seeds.

The woods are just not good. But if you count the time, it's probably almost over.

Sure enough, the next moment, only to hear a fierce beast roar, or finally knocked Fu Shuangxue to the ground.

"Brother Fu!!" Xu let out a piercing scream and ran to fu Shuangxue, trying to wake her up.

However, Fu Shuang xue did not react at all.

Probably due to excessive shock and loss, Xu finally fainted on Fu Shuangxue with a cry of caution.

Of course, Fu Shuangxue is, after all, no young genius in the world, against high order fierce beast, although fu Shuangxue is still faint in the end, but the fierce beast has been scarred, and then attack the potential.

According to the usual plot, the beast would have retired and gone home to recuperate.

This time, however, the fierce beast took two steps back and was about to leave when suddenly his eyes lit up and he looked at Wen Ying with greedy eyes... Melon seeds in hand.

Her stir-fried seeds, are they this delicious? Not only small mosquitoes small insects, now even big tigers eat.

title: HundredFinance借贷协议的治理代币$HND价格分析
body:
我曾于半年前（2022.2.20）发推分析了[@HundredFinance](https://twitter.com/HundredFinance)借贷协议的治理代币$HND的价格走势，当时$HND价格为1.26$，而当前$HND价格为0.06$，验证了“熊市不言底”这一结论。下面与我一起重温一下当时的分析😄。

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*

今天闲着无事，想来分析一下 [@HundredFinance](https://twitter.com/HundredFinance) 借贷协议的治理代币 $HND 的价格走势。今天单纯讨论币价，具体的玩法就不介绍了，可以参考项目白皮书，无非就是Defi套娃的玩法（写在前面，本人就是个入圈不到一年的小韭菜，如果分析有偏差还请多多指教。此外，以下分析不构成投资建议，DYOR）

最早接触到 [@HundredFinance](https://twitter.com/HundredFinance) 还是在 [@adamscochran](https://twitter.com/adamscochran) 2022年万字财富密码中，Adam认为其属于高风险但也是高潜力的项目，若无法占领市场就可能损失（目前市场上知名的借贷协议有AAVE和Compound），他本人看好但还没有建仓，估计在等一个入场时机。另外提一嘴，项目开发者是 [@vfat0](https://twitter.com/vfat0)，也是我看好的原因。

虽然 [@HundredFinance](https://twitter.com/HundredFinance) 其实就是Compound的仿盘，但是其代币分配逻辑和AAVE更加类似（从项目前身进行代币迁移，ETHLend ->AAVE，Percent Finance->Hundred Finance），且AAVE是借贷协议的绝对龙头，价格及估值更加合理，因此将 $HND 和 $AAVE 进行对比。

![$AAVE vs $HND](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GO7G4ptiIlsB6MUZ3aC5m.jpeg?height=780&width=1114)

结论：随着HND继续释放利好消息，如支持更多的链和更多资产（伴随着安全性降低）、引入mveHND跨链治理机制、引入跨链借贷（希望赶在AAVE V3前面）， 我认为只要项目不出现重大问题，币价应该还有3\~5倍的上涨空间，但随着币市走熊，还是需要自行判断入场时机，毕竟熊市不言底，我还没经历过熊市😂。

当然还有砸盘可能：项目前身（Percent Finance）的大户拥有20%的代币归属，这20%的10%在15/9/2021年立即解锁，剩余90%会在一年内线性解锁，也就是15/9/2022时完全解锁，从Hundred Finance: PCT to HND Vesting这个合约中能够观察到大户一直在解锁售出 (0x26596af66A10Cb6c6fe890273eD37980D50f2448)

![$HND distribution](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MKD0NfimGIWMX9j3DzJCI.jpeg?height=952&width=1200)

title: WIS Open Beta 1.130 Updated
body:
V1.130 is officially launched. In addition to what we've announced, we've added rewards for loot boxes and gems to telegram groups. Please contact our 🤖️bot friend to claim your rewards.

The following links are the content of the previous preview:

[https://mirror.xyz/wisxyz.eth/FagEz3GU8Uicc_3FAFSyUiC10IaGi6ScrX7XNWm5Dfg](https://mirror.xyz/wisxyz.eth/FagEz3GU8Uicc_3FAFSyUiC10IaGi6ScrX7XNWm5Dfg)

[https://mirror.xyz/wisxyz.eth/0YCevYSDRE3ft4aaxjajazIR--KCjQX-dj48aJ4OhcE](https://mirror.xyz/wisxyz.eth/0YCevYSDRE3ft4aaxjajazIR--KCjQX-dj48aJ4OhcE)

## The main updates in this version:

* UMT reward mode is now available.
  * When the used PFP reaches level 30, you can click the WIST reward number on the left side of the homepage to switch between WIST and UMT rewards.
  * When switching to UMT mode, all gameplay rewards UMT.
  * UMT reward efficiency is affected by the **Ability** attribute.
* Loot boxes drop in various gameplays.
  * The probability and quality of the drop will be affected by the **luck** value.
  * Loot boxes of different qualities produce different quantities and levels of gems.
* PFP gem sockets can now be opened.
  * The sockets are divided into different types and different gems can be placed.
  * The socket type can also be seen when it is not open.
* Gems can now be upgraded through Gem Minting Events.
  * The upgrade of gems will be **100%** successful.
  * Every 5 gems can be upgraded to a higher level gem.
  * Use low-level gems with higher attributes as much as possible to upgrade.
* Gems can now be traded within the WIS App.
  * You can choose to trade with WIST or UMT.
  * The current trading price cannot be lower than 100.
  * 10% of the tokens of each successful transaction will be burned.
* The storage space of gems can be increased by holding more PFP.
  * Each PFP will provide 1 to 5 gem storage spaces.
  * Higher quality PFPs provide more gem storage space.
* Now you can start participating in the Gem Hunter gameplay.
  * Gem Hunter is a casual puzzle game mode.
  * Click on gemstone on the home minimap to enter a random gem hunter level.
  * It is recommended to click the ❓ button to learn how to play before entering.
  * The input of intelligence will also bring different value to the game system.

## Some functional optimizations in the version：

* When the vitality value of PFP is too low, a reminder will appear in the exercise interface.
* The color of the name of the PFP in the list will be displayed according to different qualities.
* The official Twitter and Telegram groups can be opened directly from the app sidebar.
* PFPs and Gems in the marketplace within the WIS App can now be sorted.
* The profile tab page now refreshes faster.

## Some of the event rewards this update brings:

* In the invitation interface of the profile tab page, you can use the invitation points and activation points to exchange loot boxes.
  * 5 Invitation Points can be exchanged for a loot box.
  * 2 Activation Points can be exchanged for a loot box.
* The airdrop on the official Telegram group has ended, but we have added new rewards.
  * Use **/lootbox** to claim a random loot box. (Requires Activation Code)
  * Use **/gem** to claim a random gem. (Requires Verification Level 3)
  * Contact our bot friends to claim rewards at <https://t.me/wisdao>

body:
An elegant snapshot of [Dalio’s](https://www.principles.com/big-debt-crises) long-term debt cycle.

[https://twitter.com/ThHappyHawaiian/status/1546527570748899328?s=20&t=LiiwtMy--cuEFnyB1Y9SYA](https://twitter.com/ThHappyHawaiian/status/1546527570748899328?s=20&t=LiiwtMy--cuEFnyB1Y9SYA)

## Key takeaways from my attempt to botch the chart

![Orange and red boxes represent different epochs of inflation (LHS)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PLrmfq33u5DHzNvJPZ_Gl.png?height=1612&width=2362)

* **(1) There is hope:** Through [technology](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petrodollar_recycling), [we](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_E._Simon) clearly managed to innovate our way into a new paradigm of trust and collaboration, and solved a post-war [dilemma](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triffin_dilemma#:\~:text=The%20Triffin%20dilemma%20or%20Triffin,serve%20as%20global%20reserve%20currencies.), (maybe partially). [We](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_population) *may* be able to pull it off, again. In that case, the squiggly blue line (RHS) marches further Northeast, well beyond the red-dotted lines. 

  **(2) Not all doom and gloom:**
  * **(a) Binary outcome:** “Bust” soon, fix later. Not sure where squiggly line lands.
    * It all depends on degree of the bust. Pick your poison(s) for the fix:
      * (i) scaling [60/40](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dedicated_portfolio_theory) stock/bond allocation all the way up to 100/0 and/or;
      * (ii) pegging [gold](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gold_standard) and/or [Bitcoin](https://saifedean.com/). 
  * **(b) Kick the can:** Thank your lucky stars the largest Central Bank in the world is still in a position to provide liquidity to the market, and the economy. We can’t take this for granted - some Central Banks from other developed nations have already lost this tool. This may suggest, we have yet some time to keep playing within the sandbox until we either:
    * (i) inevitably end up in 2(a) scenario, or 
    * (ii) innovate back to (1). 
  * Back to 2(b), the key question is, liquidity in what form?

![Liquidity comes in many shapes and sizes, be careful what you wish for, and own up to it!](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OJzR9Qbt4Xs2NKPr7u3B-.gif?height=202&width=360)

title: 블록체인 확장 솔루션 101
body:
블록체인 스케일링 솔루션은 블록체인 산업을 발전시키고 성장을 가속화하기 위해 만들어졌습니다. CoinMarketCap은 확장 솔루션에만 초점을 맞춘 43개의 프로젝트를 추적합니다.

분석가들은 글로벌 블록체인 시장의 가치가 2021년 47억 달러에서 2029년 1,638억 달러로 CAGR 56.3%로 증가하여 확장 가능한 블록체인 기술의 엄청난 성장을 가져올 것으로 예측합니다.

**블록체인 확장성**

블록체인 확장성이란 무엇입니까? 확장성은 블록체인 네트워크의 용량을 늘릴 수 있는 능력을 나타냅니다. 인터넷 속도가 케이블 연결, 대역폭, 서비스 제공업체 및 하드웨어에 의해 따르는 것과 같이 데이터를 처리하는 블록체인의 능력은 트랜잭션, 노드, 처리 능력 등의 수에 의해 결정됩니다.  
 

블록체인은 현재 블록체인 트릴레마로 알려진 문제에 직면해 있습니다. 이더리움, 솔라나 등 많은 레이어1 블록체인이 있지만, 레이어2 확장 프로젝트가 기존 레이어1의 문제를 해결하는 것은 놀라운 일이 아닙니다. 

TPS(Transactions Per Second)는 블록체인에서 가장 중요한 지표입니다. Visa는 약 1,700 TPS를 처리할 수 있는 반면 Ethereum은 현재 15 TPS를 처리합니다.

높은 거래 비용은 이더리움 네트워크를 괴롭힙니다. 네트워크의 혼잡도에 따라 가스 요금은 거래당 몇 센트에서 몇 백 달러까지 다양합니다. 가스 요금은 변동하기에 사용자는 더 낮은 비용으로 감소할 때까지 기다리는 것이 일반적입니다.

이더리움의 블록 시간은 약 14초이지만 계속 증가하는 요구조건을 충족시키기에는 충분하지 않습니다. 블록 크기를 늘리면 블록당 더 많은 트랜잭션을 채우는 데 도움이 되지만 블록 시간에 부정적인 영향을 미치고 노드 스토리지 요구 사항이 증가합니다.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CJbmGpRCJ26W4auHM0WSm.JPG?height=726&width=622)

 
 

이더리움은 PoS(Proof of Stake)로 마이그레이션하고 블록 검증에서 트랜잭션 속도와 효율성을 높이기 위해 샤딩을 도입하려 합니다. 카르다노(에이다)는 레이어 1 블루칩의 모든 단점을 해결하는 블록체인을 개발하기 위해 노력하고 있습니다.

**사이드체인이란?**

사이드체인은 다른 메인넷 또는 상위 블록체인에서 작동하는 별도의 블록체인 네트워크입니다. 양방향 페그는 상호 운용성을 가능하게 하여 디지털 자산을 이들 간에 전송할 수 있는 연결을 설정합니다. 자동차가 양방향으로 주행하는 양방향 터널을 상상해 보십시오. 사이드체인에는 일반 계산이 오프체인에서 발생하도록 하는 합의 알고리즘이 있어 메인넷의 부하를 줄입니다. (폴리곤, SKALE, Gnosis 등) 

**롤업이란?** 

롤업은 확장성과 보안 향상에 중점을 둔 스마트 컨트랙트 형태의 레이어 2 솔루션입니다. 메인 체인과 레이어 2 프로토콜 간의 중계 역할을 하는 트랜잭션은 이더리움 블록체인 밖에서 수행됩니다. 그런 다음 롤업은 데이터를 일괄 처리하고 압축하여 메인 이더리움 체인으로 보냅니다. 이 모든 활동은 메인 체인에서 트랜잭션을 처리하는 데 필요한 계산 부하를 줄입니다.

롤업에는 두 가지 유형이 있습니다. 

**옵티미스틱 롤업**

옵티미스틱 롤업은 기본적으로 유효하지 않은 거래가 이루어졌다는 증거만 제시합니다. 사기/부정 거래가 감지될 때마다 이를 확인합니다. 주요 옵티미스틱 롤업 프로젝트에는 낙관적 롤업 프로젝트에는 시리즈 A 라운드를 유치한 Arbitrum, Optimism 및 Boba Network 등이 있습니다.

**영지식(ZK) 롤업**

영지식(ZK) 롤업은 ZK-SNARK(Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge)라고 하는 암호화 증명인 유효성 증명을 활용합니다. ZK-SNARK를 통해 사용자는 암호화된 트랜잭션을 즉시 전송하여 트랜잭션 유효성 검사 자체 이외의 정보를 공개하지 않고 증명이 유효한지 확인할 수 있습니다.

ZK 롤업은 사이드체인과 통합되어 메인 체인에서 처리되는 트랜잭션 블록 검증에 필요한 스토리지 및 컴퓨팅 리소스를 줄입니다. 예를 들어 수백 개의 개별 트랜잭션을 차례로 처리하는 대신 단일 트랜잭션을 통해 트랜잭션을 롤업하여 처리할 수 있습니다.

**채널이란?** 

채널은 트랜잭션 속도와 용량을 높이기 위해 다양한 메커니즘을 사용하여 오프체인 트랜잭션 채널과 블록체인 간의 통신을 용이하게 합니다. 사용자는 총 2개의 온체인 트랜잭션만 제출하면 되지만 여러 개의 오프체인 트랜잭션을 만들 수 있습니다.

예를 들어 사용자는 다중 서명 계약에서 ETH의 일부를 잠글 수 있으며 이는 첫 번째 온체인 트랜잭션으로 작동합니다. 채널이 열리면 다른 사용자가 오프체인에서 여러 거래를 할 수 있습니다. 상호 작용이 완료되면 최종 트랜잭션이 온체인으로 제출되어 상태가 잠금 해제됩니다. Connext, Kchannels, Perun은 채널을 사용하는 프로젝트입니다.

**브릿지란?**

브리지는 블록체인과 사이드체인 간의 상호 운용성을 가능하게 합니다. 이 상호 운용성은 이러한 플랫폼 간의 토큰, 스마트 컨트랙트 지침 및 데이터 전송을 지원합니다. 사용자는 한 블록체인 dApp에서 다른 블록체인 dApp으로 디지털 자산을 배포하고 느린 체인에서 호스팅되는 빠르고 비용 효율적인 트랜잭션을 수행하고 많은 블록체인에서 dApp을 실행할 수 있습니다. 일부 주목할만한 다리로는 바이낸스 브릿지(Binance Bridge)와 아발란체(Avalanche Bridge)가 있습니다.

**비즈니스에 적합한 확장 솔루션**

하이퍼레저 패브릭(Hyperledger Fabric) 및 콘센시스 쿠오럼(Consensys Qorum)과 같은 허가형 블록체인은 기업이 사용하기에 이상적일 수 있습니다. 한편, 소규모 프로젝트의 경우 레이어 2 솔루션으로 필요한 작업을 수행하기에 충분합니다.

예를 들어, 기업은 이더리움 메인 체인에서 결제 애플리케이션용 dApp을 개발하는 대신 SKALE, Polygon PoS 또는 Loom Network의 사이드 체인 생태계를 활용할 수 있습니다.

한편, 즉각적이고 무료인 P2P  이더리움 트랜잭션이 필요한 경우 Perun 또는 Connext와 같은 상태 채널이 솔루션이 될 수 있습니다.

다른 체인에서 디지털 자산을 사용하여 비즈니스를 수행하려면 크로스 체인 브리지를 사용하는 플랫폼을 찾아 사용할 수도 있습니다.

[https://www.blockdata.tech/blog/general/blockchain-scaling-solutions-101-an-overview](https://www.blockdata.tech/blog/general/blockchain-scaling-solutions-101-an-overview)

옵티미스틱 롤업은 기본적으로 유효하지 않은 거래가 이루어졌다는 증거만 제시합니다. 사기/부정 거래가 감지될 때마다 이를 확인합니다. 주요 옵티미스틱 롤업 프로젝트에는 낙관적 롤업 프로젝트에는 시리즈 A 라운드를 유치한 Arbitrum, Optimism 및 Boba Network 등이 있습니다.

**영지식(ZK) 롤업**

영지식(ZK) 롤업은 ZK-SNARK(Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge)라고 하는 암호화 증명인 유효성 증명을 활용합니다. ZK-SNARK를 통해 사용자는 암호화된 트랜잭션을 즉시 전송하여 트랜잭션 유효성 검사 자체 이외의 정보를 공개하지 않고 증명이 유효한지 확인할 수 있습니다.

ZK 롤업은 사이드체인과 통합되어 메인 체인에서 처리되는 트랜잭션 블록 검증에 필요한 스토리지 및 컴퓨팅 리소스를 줄입니다. 예를 들어 수백 개의 개별 트랜잭션을 차례로 처리하는 대신 단일 트랜잭션을 통해 트랜잭션을 롤업하여 처리할 수 있습니다.

**채널이란?** 

채널은 트랜잭션 속도와 용량을 높이기 위해 다양한 메커니즘을 사용하여 오프체인 트랜잭션 채널과 블록체인 간의 통신을 용이하게 합니다. 사용자는 총 2개의 온체인 트랜잭션만 제출하면 되지만 여러 개의 오프체인 트랜잭션을 만들 수 있습니다.

예를 들어 사용자는 다중 서명 계약에서 ETH의 일부를 잠글 수 있으며 이는 첫 번째 온체인 트랜잭션으로 작동합니다. 채널이 열리면 다른 사용자가 오프체인에서 여러 거래를 할 수 있습니다. 상호 작용이 완료되면 최종 트랜잭션이 온체인으로 제출되어 상태가 잠금 해제됩니다. Connext, Kchannels, Perun은 채널을 사용하는 프로젝트입니다.

**브릿지란?**

브리지는 블록체인과 사이드체인 간의 상호 운용성을 가능하게 합니다. 이 상호 운용성은 이러한 플랫폼 간의 토큰, 스마트 컨트랙트 지침 및 데이터 전송을 지원합니다. 사용자는 한 블록체인 dApp에서 다른 블록체인 dApp으로 디지털 자산을 배포하고 느린 체인에서 호스팅되는 빠르고 비용 효율적인 트랜잭션을 수행하고 많은 블록체인에서 dApp을 실행할 수 있습니다. 일부 주목할만한 다리로는 바이낸스 브릿지(Binance Bridge)와 아발란체(Avalanche Bridge)가 있습니다.

**비즈니스에 적합한 확장 솔루션**

하이퍼레저 패브릭(Hyperledger Fabric) 및 콘센시스 쿠오럼(Consensys Qorum)과 같은 허가형 블록체인은 기업이 사용하기에 이상적일 수 있습니다. 한편, 소규모 프로젝트의 경우 레이어 2 솔루션으로 필요한 작업을 수행하기에 충분합니다.

예를 들어, 기업은 이더리움 메인 체인에서 결제 애플리케이션용 dApp을 개발하는 대신 SKALE, Polygon PoS 또는 Loom Network의 사이드 체인 생태계를 활용할 수 있습니다.

한편, 즉각적이고 무료인 P2P  이더리움 트랜잭션이 필요한 경우 Perun 또는 Connext와 같은 상태 채널이 솔루션이 될 수 있습니다.

다른 체인에서 디지털 자산을 사용하여 비즈니스를 수행하려면 크로스 체인 브리지를 사용하는 플랫폼을 찾아 사용할 수도 있습니다.

title: The Path | (un)known.
body:
In about 3 weeks, I'll begin a new chapter in my story.

It's bittersweet as I'm leaving my current place in Encinitas, CA where I've been for 2 years.

It's a 5 minute walk from the beach, has everything I need, and is close to my family.

But that's not as important...

The special thing about this place is how much I've grown here; and it's emotional.

2 years ago, I was a broken person, still reeling from a devastating breakup, jobless, and in the midst of covid... I took a leap of faith...

Anything was better than my parent's floor...

With $1500 to my name and a 3-month "half-rent" grace period, I decided I was going to just go and figure it the fuck out.

Can you guess what happened?

It was painful, but I could, for what felt like the first time in my life... finally breathe.

At that time, I was scrambling for small $50 and $100 logo design jobs, and putting my stimulus checks into ETH.

This was right around July 2020.

I spent literal DAYS alone at the beach. Journalling hundreds of pages. Micro-dosing. Painting. Crying. Reflecting.

Wondering...

Physical connection, in all forms was super healing.

I started doing JiuJitsu once a week and couldn't move for 4 days afterward. Thankfully I improved.

Then one day, I got a mysterious message invite to "Clubhouse" from a person I (to-this-day) have zero recollection of...

It was nice to hear people's voice, and the novelty of the app was interesting to me.

I enjoy chatting, but was never a "good speaker."

The lack of video gave me courage to speak up and start making new friends.

Fast forward 3 months...

A chance encounter with (now-famous) visual artists drew me into "NFT" rooms, and the rest is history. -- For those of you who remember, I was (luckily) there for many special, and what now feel like 'divine' moments.

We all KNEW there was magic happening...

We KNEW that the world was changing forever.

But what I KNEW more, and hold close to the heart even now, is that I had discovered something I never had before. "My People."

Other artists, biohackers, entrepreneurs... people with strange dreams doing fascinating things...

The nostalgia is overwhelming.

To summarize what happened in 2021:

A - Financial "security" for the first time... (it wasn't a lot of money).

B - Released so much trauma around "being a starving artist," it felt like I was given permission to create again...

C - Got an iPad and started minting my own NFTs

D - Got way healthier. Watched a bunch of anime. Read tons.

E - First NFT NYC + ART BASEL (changed my life)

F - Started working with Audius and growing as a CM

G - Was able to get my family good Christmas gifts (meant a lot).

H - Constantly learning about web3, and helping people with projects, which helped my self-worth increase.

It wasn't perfect, I definitely fucked up some NFT flips and lost money, was still processing my last relationship, but I felt alive, things were changing for the better...

Which brings us to the start of this year.

Turbulent again.

We hit the top of the market-cycle, but the kool-aid was fuckin' delicious. Bounced around a few jobs/projects. Met a chick, didn't work out. Whatever. -- Good fuel for making art.

NFTLA... Then the bear really hit.

This year's NFTNYC feels like 6 months ago.

Anyway, we're here now. July 2022.

I'm building a music + anime + web3 project in the middle of an impending global economic collapse, and cash is thin with all of us.

I'm leaving my comfort zone, my support system, and my family...

Why?

Well, just like in 2020, I'm taking a leap of faith.

I know it's time to go, I've been feeling it for months; and it always happens in the same way where God/Universe/Source unexpectedly opens doors to confirm it.

On paper, nothing I'm doing makes sense...

I'm going to start with a short-term (3 month, maybe 6..) lease agreement with a friend up in Portland. -- I love the nature of the Pacific Northwest; but it honestly was not my first choice for a new city... I need the sunlight...

What am I thinking? Planning? Feeling?

I'm not entirely sure...

In fact... aside from making art, making music, growing Headphone Homies, and keeping the bills paid with design clients...

I don't have a damn clue.

I'm trusting that just like before, the uncertainty and environment will catalyze massive growth.

It happens every time.

So yeah, I'm apprehensive. I'm a little sad. But I'm also optimistic, and a little glad. -- (Rhymes, haha).

I'd drop a whole mixtape on the situation, because I need to stop neglecting my poetic abilities; but that's another conversation...

All this to say:

I can feel, deeply -- some would say 'spiritually' ...that I'm entering a new season of life.

I'll be 30 in November.

I still feel like I'm 17, 25, and 50 simultaneously.

Age is a lame metric, but it still trips me out.

I'm both blessed and terrified.

Who knows what will happen... in this (beautiful + broken) world; this industry, with my family, my friends... with everything... with all of us...

A younger me would've wished for the answer, my present self is at peace with the mystery, and my future self is already laughing.

*long-exhale*

I love you.

Yeah.

I mean it.

This reality and our lives will eternally be a neuro-aesthetic, wave-melting, bio-spiritual, hyper-fractal, heart-erupting cinematic dream...

I'm in awe of that whenever I take the rare, undistracted moment to surrender to it.


It's an ineffable privilege to participate in both authoring and experiencing this story here with you today.

Artifacts, algorithms.
Adventure, ascension.

We'll create them.
We'll explore.

My friends, our destiny will be defined by two things:

The decisions we make, and the direction we walk.

Onwards and upwards,
\-- Sam Hayek

title: Meet the crown Prince
body:
At the same time.

On the mountain outside Yingtianfu, Zhu Chen smiled happily.

He started down the hill with three rabbit ears in his hand and his quiver on his back.

"Hey hey, today luck is quite good, tao rabbit nest, call it a day and go home."

If the prince knew that he was digging a rabbit hole, I was afraid that he would be distressed to tears on the spot.

At this point, the sun has just set, it's dusk, rhubarb.

Zhu Chen smiled: "this hunting of life, comparable to the previous life of 996 to much more relaxed, beautiful."

"When is my system coming?"

I've been in Daming for so many years, it's hard to justify not having a system, right?

It may be that the words had an echo, and suddenly a voice sounded.

"Daming invincible system activated, is it open?"

title: Your family won't forget you
body:
The old eunuch was bleeding from the knock on his forehead. He got up and hurried back. The princess was still waiting for news from him.

The old eunuch kowtowed outside the matter, Zhu Chen naturally is not aware of, at the moment he is cooking a fire.

Remembering the words of the old eunuch, Zhu Chen could not help smiling bitterly: "Ah, just an orphan who nobody wants, let alone wearing a yellow robe."

He would have died if his adoptive parents had not saved him.

At this time, suddenly came a reminder sound in my mind.

title: Web3魔法大全（一）
body:
最近The Block 的研究员 [@mhonkasalo](https://twitter.com/mhonkasalo) 针对$UNI的价值提出了一套赋能的方案，受到了很多行业kol的关注。我不评价方案的好坏，只是从中引发了我的思考，作为web3领域最大的dex协议（公司），Uniswap的token价值是不清晰的，以至于社区忍受不了，开始主动想办法来帮助$UNI捕获价值。那么token到底应该怎么来设计？

很多人喜欢把治理权作为token的最佳使用场景，这在牛市是没问题的，因为牛市赚钱靠叙事，一个没有天花板的叙事胜过一切，和系统营收能力强挂钩的代币模型反而会因为初创期盈利能力不佳而吃亏。但是到了熊市，纸鸢飞的再高也要落地，寻找价值支撑就变成了holder们最头疼的事。毕竟谁也无法接受把自己的毕生财富押注在一个“叙事”上度过寒冬，这也许就是当下$UNI holder们正在焦虑的事。

**Token是术，解决真实需求是道**

很多圈内创业者问我token该怎么设计的时候，我一直强调，经济模型其实是术层面的东西。我觉得大家更应该从道层面去思考，你为什么要做web3创业？为什么这个想法在web2环境下你创业无法成功？如果在web2环境下做不了为什么有了token就有机会成功？

我发现超过95%的创业者其实对上面几个问题的思考是不够的。总觉得web3人傻钱多韭菜好骗，哪怕是过时的商业模式甚至被人为创造出来的伪需求，都可以通过发个token获得成功。这是行业给人的错觉，但是事实是：优秀的商业模式才能存续和壮大，真实存在的需求才能催生出成功的创业项目。

所以，token是术，解决真实需求是道。有道无术，术尚可求；有术无道，止于术。这一轮很多项目因为其有(bao)趣(li)的token模型使得其获得了短期的辉煌，在很快的时间里积攒了大量的用户和收入，token价格也扶摇直上，但是他们的终局都是硬着陆，因为他们并没有解决真正的需求，在底层商业模式上存在严重缺陷。

我们以游戏为例，p2e的出现曾一度让人大呼这才是未来，但是为什么没有一款gamefi撑到现在？哪怕龙头Axie目前的数据也已经惨不忍睹了。因为他们没有解决大家玩游戏的根本需求：玩游戏是想体验美妙的游戏体验。再来，为什么DeFi summer时期，各种新兴dex的头矿生命周期越来越短？因为他们没有根本解决大家要有更好交易体验的需求（低摩擦，高效率）。当作为激励物的币价失去支撑时，大多的交易需求还是回归到Uni，一个近似没有经济模型的dex协议上，为什么大家不要矿了？因为这里的交易体验最好，我想要交易，我肯定优先选这里。

所以找到真实的需求并解决，永远是创业的核心。而token模型是帮助你达成这一目标的手段而已。有人说，需求可以被创造，如果一个好的经济模型可以持续创造出需求，那这也是一种成功的创业模式啊。这个我是认同的，人的需求确实是可以被创造的，就像Axie。我相信有很多“用户”都不是因为喜欢玩这款游戏，而是是为了赚token而去玩。这其实就是某种意义上的创造需求。而且web3项目，因为有token，所以肯定能吸引到一部分人为了赚token而来使用产品。但是你们看到，我在这里用的词是赚token，而不是赚钱。这两者在本质上我觉得是有差异的。

**Token是钱，也不是钱**

相信很多人有这样的体验，在牛市顶峰的时候，每次打开自己的钱包，发现钱包里一堆资产，各个的价值都很夸张，卖一部分的时候很快就卖掉了，滑点也不大。然后在熊市的时候再打开，发现这些资产已经跌的所剩无几了，当要清仓的时候，发现真正卖掉还要再打个骨折（因为流动性不足），总体跌幅会非常夸张。

从这个例子上就可以看出，token是不是钱，非常看时机，本质是看流动性。如果在合适的时机（流动性），token可以看作是钱的等价物（甚至是会升值的钱），但是在更多时间里，token其实更像是空头支票。所以如果你的核心运营模式是用token作为激励来吸引用户，那么你一定要清楚何时你奖励出去的token对用户来说是最有价值的，这时候他为系统做出贡献的动力也是最足的，你需要最大的榨取他的价值。否则当token的价值拐点来临，token的激励效果会大幅下降，你想再鼓励用户为系统做出贡献就很难了。甚至往往还会开启负螺旋，币价的快速下跌引发恐慌抛售和数据下滑，基本面趋坏进一步推动币价下跌。最终伤害那些对系统有忠诚度的用户，导致硬着陆。

所以在token>=钱的时期，web3项目的token激励模型其实和web2世界里补贴获客模式非常相似。区别只是在于，web2的公司是用真金白银来补贴，而web3公司用的是token来补贴。不要小看这么一个区别，对于初创公司来说的差别是非常大的。

**Web3公司的魔法**

一家创业公司无法凭空变出钱来进行补贴，但是他可以选择发行token来补贴。前者受制于条件，后者人人都可以做。从这个角度，token就像魔法，是凭空变出来的“钱”，这也是这个行业和这个时代的最大机遇，毕竟在web2世界想用魔法手段凭空创造出现金等价物并用于商业行为的人基本都已经进去了。那么如何使用这个魔法呢？

这个答案其实应该由创业者自己来回答。因为每一个商业场景中的核心贡献者和行为是不一样的，所谓的补贴和激励主要是要给到核心贡献者。就像打车场景下，打车的用户（需求）和司机（供给）是主要贡献者，打车和接单是主要的贡献行为。在听歌场景下，听歌用户（需求）和歌曲版权拥有方（供给）是主要贡献者，购买歌曲、评论、发行上传是主要的贡献行为。其他场景下的例子还有很多，不管是游戏、交易、社交、还是电商。

Token经济的模型就是魔法的使用说明，当一个商业模式成立的情况下，优秀的魔法师和不会魔法的人进行竞争，差距还是很大的。行业诞生以来，我们看到了很多有趣的经济模型，本文旨在整理和归纳有价值的token模型，并对其优缺点和适用场景进行分析。

title: StarkWare：最强Layer2技术团队，StarkNet破局还得靠技术
body:
**TL;DR**

1，StarkWare很早就确定了以技术为核心的商业模式，StarkEx是其主要盈利来源

2，StarkNet生态还在发展初期，原生和创新项目多，技术进展是主要瓶颈

3，NFT、GameFi或许可以成为StarkWare的优势赛道。

以太坊Layer2相对于alt L1有着明显的安全性和去中心化优势。竞争公链经常被曝出宕机、安全事故，Layer2很少有这样的消息。

在所有Layer2中，ZK Rollup系的Layer2又是以太坊分支中最正统的。它在所有Layer2中最安全。而且随着交易人数的增加，每个人分摊到的交易费会降低，有比较好的扩容效果。

因为这些原因，ZK Rollup系Layer2广受支持。例如钱包项目Argent就曾表达过对ZK系的偏爱，Argent表示不会支持Optimistic Rollup生态，因为其将专注于ZK系的zkSync和StarkNet。

大家对ZK Rollup Layer2的期待主要寄托在zkSync和StarkWare上。哔哔News研究了这两个生态中的100多个项目，本文将解析StarkWare生态的现状、特点、挑战、发展方向，以及未来展望。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uz4kOls9eut0TdWD7Gk_H.png?height=819&width=1254)

 *46个StarkWare生态项目 来源：哔哔News*

**StarkWare概况**

**1，简介**

StarkWare是一个技术团队，致力于通过零知识证明（ZKP）来解决以太坊扩容问题。StarkWare先后给出了2个ZK Rollup Layer2方案——StarkEx和StarkNet。

StarkEx是一个可扩展性引擎，通过to B的方式赚服务费。我们熟知的Immutable X、dYdX、DeversiFi、Sorare都基于StarkEx构建。

**StarkEx在提升性能和降低Gas费方面起到了很大的作用。**据悉，dYdX的gas费原来占到收入的90-100%，StarkEx帮助dYdX把gas费降低到1/50，为dYdX节约了近3亿美元，促进业务增长了500倍。

不过StarkEx上的项目彼此独立，无法组合。可能是因为这个原因，StarkWare又推出了开放性更好的StarkNet。StarkNet是真正意义上的Layer2，任何DAPP都可以在上面部署，应用之间可组合。

有了StarkEx这个成功的案例，市场对于StarkNet普遍看好。**从数据的维度来讲，StarkEx无疑是成功的，而StarkNet还在生态发展初期。发展StarkNet生态应该会成为StarkWare团队的重心。**

**2，团队**

StarkWare团队以“技术能力”闻名。

Eli Ben-Sasson：联合创始人兼首席科学家。他是世界顶级密码学科学家。目前最主流的两种零知识证明系统SK-SNARKs、ZK-STARKs都由他联合发明。他还是Zcash项目的创始科学家，以色列理工学院计算机专业教授。

Alessandro Chiesa：联合创始人兼首席科学家，加州大学伯克利分校计算机专业教授。他也是ZK-SNARKs的联合发明者，Zcash联合创始人。

Michael Riabzev：联合创始人兼首席架构师，以色列理工学院的博士。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cY1ko1abIM0eXLXz5C-LY.jpg?height=721&width=1080)

*Michael Riabzev、EliBen-Sasson、Uri Kolodny 来源：阿法兔研究笔记*

除了技术能力，StarkWare团队也有很强的PR能力，对于盈利和商业模式在一开始就有明确的定位。这主要得益于联合创始人兼CEO Uri Kolodny，他是一个连续创业者，是StarkWare在商业和对外上的掌舵手。

StarkWare早在2018年的博客中就明确了自己的战略路线“要建立一个有持续收入的企业，基于对现金和收入的要求，创始团队做出的策略是，首先要开发可以满足需求的技术”。**也就是说把技术作为核心，通过开发技术方案，提供技术服务，确保企业的持续收入。**

StarkWare在持续地发挥他们的“技术”特色，树立“技术”形象。团队很早就开始构建技术博客，把自己对于要做的事情的理解和科学上的研究成果，时刻和外界用户进行同步，Vitalik经常给StarkWare的论文提建议。

**3，融资**

正是因为技术上的专长，以及和风投机构打交道的能力，StarkWare深受投资机构青睐。Vitalik是他们种子轮投资者。除了Vitalik之外，投资方名单中还包括Paradigm、红杉资本、Pantera Capital、Founders Fund等重复投资者。

截止目前，StarkWare已经完成6轮融资，分别是种子轮、Grant、A轮、B轮、C轮、D轮，总共融资2.73亿美元。尤其是最近一轮融资，融资金额达到1亿美元，StarkWare估值直接翻了两番，达到80亿美元。估值在所有Layer2中排名第一。

**4，链上数据**

从数据维度来看，StarkEx已经成功。StarkEx生态中总共有4个项目——Immutable X、dYdX、DeversiFi、Sorare，每个项目的锁仓量、交易数据在Layer2中都能独当一面。

截止7月6日，StarkEx生态TVL 6.96亿美元，总共处理了1.96亿笔交易，总交易额6350亿美元，总共铸造了6050万个NFT。StarkEx是StarkWare的主要盈利来源。

相比之下，StarkNet生态还在发展初期。

**独立地址数：**不到2万个。StarkNet的独立地址数在四大OP、ZK Rollup项目（Arbitrum、Optimism、zkSync、StarkNet）中拖了后腿。独立地址数比其他三大生态要小一个量级。

从日活跃用户和日交易数的角度衡量，StarkNet近一个月的数据和zkSync接近，日活跃用户数只有几百个，日交易数也只有几百笔。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4n5iag729iphZWv2EHjST.png?height=392&width=933)

*StarkNet日交易数和日活地址 来源：Dune Analytics*

所以整体来看，在生态发展进度和生态活跃度上，ZK系Layer2落后于OP系，StarNet和zkSync进度接近。可能是因为zkSync曾承诺过会有生态原生通证，所以在独立地址数上超过StarkNet。

**Gas费：**近一个月，StarkNet网络产生的gas费低于以太坊，TPS整体上也低于以太坊。

尽管StarkNet相对于以太坊有更好的性能（以太坊每秒钟能处理7笔交易，StarkWare生态能处理上千笔交易），但StarkNet实际每秒处理的交易数以及由此产生的Gas费都低于以太坊。

这说明StarkNet网络的利用率较低，可以归因于网络发展还在初期，生态项目不多，没有完全启动。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JTmnyW8bSFl5-x4dfJjuY.png?height=718&width=934)

*StarkNet和以太坊Gas费、TPS对比 来源：Dune Analytics*

**StarkWare生态应用**

整体来看，StarkNet生态和zkSync存在类似的生态处于初期的情况。StarkNet中已上线项目不多。但是StarkNet各赛道相对均衡，不像zkSync往DeFi倾斜。

包括StarkEx在内，哔哔News统计到的StarkNet生态中已经上线项目是33个。DeFi、DEX、GameFi、NFT、桥、基础设施分别是5个、3个、6个、6个、4个、5个。

**1，DEX**

和zkSync类似，StarkNet上的项目主要是原生项目。哔哔News统计到的DEX有5个，都独属于StarkNet生态。其中已经上线的3个DEX是JediSwap、MySwap、StarkSwap。

它们都是AMM类DEX，有一点小创新。比如JediSwap的“ZAP”功能能把单一通证转变为LP进行农耕。StarkSwap界面增加了“水龙头”功能。都旨在提升用户体验。

**2，DeFi**

StarkNet比zkSync有更多的创新，这在DeFi赛道上有比较明显的体现。除了基本的借贷、质押功能，有一些项目在投资组合管理、DeFi策略方向上做尝试，并且已经上线测试网，如Starcombo、Magnety。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/haeCtiEZ3ZUmPz46RUSnq.png?height=631&width=1239)

*StarkNet上的DeFi项目 来源：哔哔News*

Stark DeFi是StarkEx上的DeFi Hub，是继dYdX、Immutable X、Sorare、DeversiFi后的第五个采用StarkEx的项目，即将上线，值得关注。此外，提供订单簿DEX的Brine Finance也有不错的质量。

**3，GameFi**

相比于其他赛道，StarkNet上的GameFi项目数量比较多，其中积木组合拆分游戏，或者类似逻辑的游戏就有3个。

The Ninth、Dope Wars、Philand是StarkNet生态中被提及比较多的GameFi项目。其中，The Ninth是一个元宇宙游戏，支持土地的买卖、升级、质押。**整体来看，StarkNet上的GameFi项目玩法都比较初级，质量不高。**

**4，NFT**

StarkNet上的NFT项目主要有以下6个。其中Immutable X和Sorare都基于StarkEx生态。剩余的4个项目中，NFT交易平台有2个，分别是Aspect（原PlayOasis）、Mint Square。NFT生态质量也一般。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gkGHSJ-0js920WPxwgNI_.png?height=400&width=1236)

*StarkNet上的NFT项目 来源：哔哔News*

**5，基础设施**

和zkSync一样，StarkNet在桥、钱包基础设施上有属于ZK Rollup系Layer2的独特性，通用型钱包和桥不适用这两个生态。

在StarkNet中，被广泛使用的钱包是Argent和Braavos。桥则是用到了Orbiter、LayerSwap、Kubri、Stargate。其中Kubri支持ERC 1155标准的NFT铸造，也支持ERC 1155在StarkNet、以太坊之间的跨链。

**StarkWare生态特点和优势**

**1，原生项目多，NFT、GameFi可以作为突破口**

StarkNet因为不兼容EVM（以太坊虚拟机），很少有以太坊生态的项目部署到其中，因此生态内的应用多为原生应用。

**与zkSync不同的是，StarkNet各赛道发展得比较均衡，**对于zkSync而言比较贫瘠的NFT、GameFi赛道，StarkNet上却有不少项目。不过StarkNet在NFT、GameFi领域也有Rollup生态的通病，那就是项目质量普遍不高。

**考虑到StarkEx上Immutable X（专注于NFT、GameFi的生态）、Sorare（数字足球NFT收藏平台）都发展得不错，NFT和GameFi或许可以作为StarkNet的突破口。**

由于GameFi等开放生态牵扯到一些复杂交互，所以ZK Rollup的技术进展同样是StarkWare团队面临的首要难题。

**2，机构对生态内项目的投资相对保守**

虽然StarkNet、zkSync两个生态中，投资机构都着重投资基础设施，以及多生态布局的优质、刚需项目，但在DeFi、NFT、GameFi上的投资，投资机构对StarkNet生态似乎相对保守。

根据哔哔News的统计，投资机构对StarkNet的投资主要集中在StarkEx生态中的4个项目、钱包Argent上，生态中的一些DeFi创新项目以及NFT、GameFi项目并未查到融资信息。相比之下，zkSync生态项目的融资信息较多。

**3，StarkEx证明了to B模式的成功**

StarkEx这种为客户提供扩容方案的商业模式已经得到验证。虽然只有4个项目采用了StarkEx，但这4个项目的数据都能独当一面。

StarkEx方案对项目方而言是有效的，另一方面，StarkWare通过StarkEx获得了持续的收入。

但是StarkEx也面临一些变局。dYdX宣布将转移到Cosmos生态做自己的应用链。根据dYdX创始人的说法，StarkEx的体验（实际TPS）并不如想象中美好。此外，一些实力强劲的客户确实可能会尝试开发自己的扩容方案，自己捕获底层协议价值。

此外，StarkNet目前不兼容EVM，这对生态发展造成了比较大的阻力。

**4，估值高企，投资阵容强大**

StarkWare目前无论是总融资额还是估值都在Layer2中排名第一。总融资额达到2.73亿美元，估值更是高达惊人的80亿美元。

此外，StarkWare还获得了Vitalik、Paradigm、红杉资本等的投资。所以，StarkWare在发展Layer2生态方面有足够的资金、技术能力、权威认可作为支撑。

**StarkWare的挑战与未来展望**

如前文所述，StarkWare面临的首要挑战来自ZK Rollup技术难题。

ZK Rollup进展缓慢，dYdX这样的案例说明StarkWare Layer2实际扩容效果仍然有限。**对于StarkWare团队而言，在技术上寻求突破仍然是首要任务。**

与此同时，OP系Layer2正在比较激进地拓展生态，扩大先发优势，Arbitrum发起奥德赛活动，Optimism推出OP。这对StarkWare在技术上的突破提出了更紧迫的要求。

在EVM兼容问题上，目前StarkNet是四大Layer2中唯一不兼容EVM的生态。这会对StarkWare生态发展带来比较大的阻力。（zkSync 2.0测试网已经兼容EVM，这可能和技术难度有关，zkSync采用ZK SNARK技术，StarkWare采用ZK STARK，后者是前者的改进版本）

**目前，StarkWare已经树立了足够的技术壁垒。他们把技术和商业模式进行结合的方式——StarkEx也已经得到验证。StarkEx是StarkWare可以继续采用的路线图。**

**在StarkNet生态的发展上，除了前面提及的技术突破外，NFT、GameFi或许可以成为StarkWare相对于其他Layer2的优势赛道。**

title: 他和他的猫，爱这个世界
body:
Shhan，一个生活在首尔的2D画家，绘画是他最喜爱的活动，并以此为生。当画作填满空白画布的时候，他感受到自己真实地存在。

*When I fill an empty page with something, all of my senses come alive, and I feel as if I’ve become the creator.  ——Shhan*

![Niki](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/niPQPyQA_ob2DPGM7Xut6.png?height=768&width=1024)

他的缪斯女神叫做Niki，一只6岁俄罗斯蓝猫，性别是女生，似乎知道到自己成为了主人的模特，非常乐意在日常生活摆pose。

**爱猫成痴**

Shhan和Niki一起生活了6年，他知道Niki并不能陪伴他非常久的时间，所以Shhan希望通过画作让Niki以另一种形式永远活在自己的生活里，于是就有了Shhan1211这个ins账号。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/p-WXqeClj_uqsBuXWGdBM.png?height=569&width=1080)

和大部分Web2.0的博主一样，Shhan将Niki的生活照用自己的画笔表达出来，然后发布到Ins上成为互联网记忆的一部分。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dmxQ2ZP_1qvygmuapo5Bp.png?height=655&width=1080)

不光是照片，Shhan也会想象Niki成为各种电影，动漫的主人公。在他心里，Niki不光是一只猫，而更像一个人。

他为此创造了很多合集，那个时候一个以Niki为主角的宇宙，开始出现了雏形。

其中也遇到了一些问题。

比如2021年，鱿鱼游戏的爆火，Shhan也第一时间将Niki放了进去。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LKFLt_S8BtQnPIKqwBfd2.png?height=1104&width=894)

但是由于版权的问题，让Shhan不得不删除了很多作品，最终这个关于鱿鱼游戏的合集并没能在2.0存续下去。

但是这并没有阻挡他想要建立一个Niki宇宙的想法，他希望自己的猫出现在香港维多利亚港，也能去大阪游玩，将现实中多元的世界和黑猫融合在一起。

在2021年的6月，他通过OpenSea第一次接触到NFT之后，他预感到自己的想法终于有了一个现实的抓手。

*The idea “only painting in the world” seemed attractive enough, and the desire to be recognized by people naturally led to the immersion in the world of NFTs.*

“世界上只有画画”的想法似乎足够吸引人，被人们认可的渴望使我很自然地沉溺在NFT的世界里。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1gsoYtRJvWHQ8ZweLr98Z.png?height=768&width=1024)

**Niki的第二条命**

最终Shhan在OpenSea的帮助下，发布了他第一个NFT系列作品：Shhans Crowned Collection。

![（Shhans Crowned收藏品）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pmYL-qU2jVFRZ8c4hC_Nh.png?height=732&width=1080)

虽然即使到现在，Shhans Crowned Collection仍旧是一个总量不过2.9e的NFT项目，但是它为之后Mimic的诞生提供了宝贵的创意与经验。

身为画家的Shhan开始设想Niki变成各种动漫人物，比如带着草帽的路飞、咬着竹筒的祢豆子、亦或是打着响指的灭霸。Mimic Shhans正式开始。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gqSFssI4zxbE1AR5HpMhH.png?height=540&width=1080)

当时正值NFT火热的时期，其中的主要形式是“Profile for Picture”，Shann也成为其中的一员，但是他整整筹备了大半年，直到2022年4月项目才正式上线。

在这之中他也有过迷茫，这不就是在提供别人一个炒作的商品吗？但是最终，对于Niki的爱支撑着他把项目做了出来。

于是，它成为了年轻人中独树一帜的亚文化。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ap6OazQYwAzWRrHbMWABN.png?height=595&width=1080)

**Niki宇宙**

Mimic Shhans 其实是Shhan构建的好多个Niki宇宙中的一个，只是他结合了动漫、电影、游戏的元素而广受人们的喜爱。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M08DBBQHRObdArWy39INA.png?height=352&width=600)

彼时CryptoPunk和Azuki如日中天，而mefers的爆火也让Shhan在内的所有人认识到了CC0的优势与建立亚文化可能性。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ZMSJUe-JAMj4-ELvh9-d.png?height=823&width=584)

于是Shhans 最后决定将版权交给整个社区，以CC0的形式发布Mimic Shhans。

Free mint，只有gas费用。

就这样，Mimic Shhans进入了一个名为Web3的新世界，没有人知道他的价值有多少，未来会形成如何的文化，人们只是单纯地喜欢他。

就像《The Shhan - Metaverse》这个作品，表达了他对于元宇宙的畅想与热情。

在大家还疑惑元宇宙要怎么开始的时候，Niki的元宇宙已悄然建立。

这可能就是艺术家独有的触觉。

现在，他和很多先驱NFT艺术家一样，拥有了自己的线上画廊

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pV3X-wZAWia_t4mD0Z49G.png?height=476&width=1080)

Shhan一定不是最后一位，Mimic Shhans 也不会是他最后一个系列作品，3.0的夜空将由更多的繁星照亮。

**你是吗**

和Shhan一样，无数的艺术家在NFT的大浪潮中选择往前踏出一步。有成功的，也有无人问津的（比如我）。

但其实无一例外的，这些项目背后，都离不开基金会和团队的帮助，这些也正是QA在做的事情。让更多艺术家可以不用花那么多的学习成本在项目上，而是专注于创作本身。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ekm8xxoauJUY0Vs7k0Emi.png?height=666&width=1000)

NFT也好，数藏也罢，都是你实现梦想的一种方式。

拥有自己的作品集、开设高自由度的线上画廊、建立自己的主题宇宙。

而你要做的，是找到你的Niki。

**-END-**

title: 国外NFT炒币，国内写真数藏全国飞？
body:
随着元宇宙和NFT领域大热，常规的数藏网站我们见了不少，比如OpenSea；各类热门NFT头像也迭代而出，比如无聊猿；但是正当国内这种繁荣现象开始逐步吸引更多眼球的时候，一些奇怪的产业链开始出现了。

我盘算了一下，这种乱象主要分为了三个部分：

**1.福利姬、女主播开始入局NFT赛道；**

**2.十八线女艺人女模特不再仅限于贩卖私人写真给粉丝，而是开始在NFT领域擦边；**

**3.还有潮流博主的多领域发展。**

前不久，我无意间发现了国内一个神秘的数藏网站，上面并不是常见的那些元宇宙资讯和攻略，而是一些以个人写真为基础的数字藏品，几乎都是“搔首弄姿”的小姐姐。

平台很委婉，标注得很清楚，这是一家“数字藏品交易平台”，同时也号称开创了探索Web3.0的社交新方式，可明眼人一看细节不就立刻会意了嘛，合着是一个打着数藏擦边球的空降平台。

好家伙，把“全国可飞”直接换了个新颖吸睛的包装？

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-Em61t-aTpe3QcsyDbN3E.jpg?height=514&width=1080)

数字藏品价格不一，点开每一张写真后，你甚至还能在介绍里发现一些购买后能享受的额外福利与待遇。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nUyjMAeBXt1CqQM0G1iO4.jpg?height=309&width=489)

就比如：

普通版，**“可加入创作者Mo平台粉丝群”**，一般价格在29.9到59元不等。

升级版，**“可在Mo平台与创作者私信”**，价格在100元。

享受版，**“可在Mo平台与创作者私信”和“十分钟语音通话”**，购买价值为520元左右。

收藏版，与**该数字藏品一致的签名照**，标价为1000元。

尊享版，**数字藏品捆绑上性感小姐姐的微信与作者人像抱枕**，价格瞬间就上去了，666元的价格仅售一枚，也有价值888元的。

暗示版，\*\*“私人物品一件”\*\*价值1888，让我想起了小蓝鸟上那些寄卖私人物品的博主们，价格一经对比，就像有什么东西镶了金。

擦边版，\*\*“可获得某地特产一份”\*\*这种藏品的价值通常在1000多元以上，但就是不知道有多特产了，或许买过才知道。

擦边升阶版，\*\*“云健身一次”\*\*的藏品价格也很高。

暗示升阶版，最炸的应该就是\*\*“购买后可同城约一次晚餐两小时”\*\*，能够做些什么，能够延伸到什么阶段，足以让用户浮想联翩。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/biUXJ_T2t7O7rWAkP05qp.jpg?height=750&width=1000)

不过，笔者还是要敲打大家一下，谨防网络招Piao诈骗，快把你们的国家反诈中心App都安装好了再去探索元宇宙里的东西（男孩女孩都千万不要裸聊哦）。

当然了，这是最近比较离谱的一个玩意，除了这些挂羊头卖狗肉的所谓NFT存在之外，还有一些知名的女艺人，或者说女网红也开始把目光转向了这一全新赛道。

在某平台发现疑似玩偶姐姐的NFT藏品，不知道是否为本人制作上传，或者只是其他一些蹭热度的创作者所为，不过之前也有传言说，玩偶姐姐在美国炒NFT赚了一个亿，现在准备上岸退休了。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xJW1AsmJnk-D4h2yx4ihG.jpg?height=420&width=599)

（OpenSea上有关玩偶姐姐的NFT）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/v7N4Mv40tKczJh5y7rfz4.jpg?height=357&width=641)

大概在今年1月份，新加坡女网红Irene Zhao，同样也是某区块链初创企业的CMO，将自己的不同写真、包括性感照，加工成了NFT在网站上出售，很快就引起了大量的关注。

她所上传的所有NFT都以自己为主角，不同的服饰与好身材，搭配上一些文字来宣传自己企业产品的特点，另外一些缩写则是区块链社区流行的黑话。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hHZwcxIU78W-KtD9YYis0.jpg?height=567&width=1080)

“IreneDAO”系列的NFT在当时甚至比不少股票的每日交易额还要多，可以说这股NFT的东风，她算是搭乘上了。

她本人也被称为“破亿颜值”。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_B7_l35EoNCpoQm6vwqni.jpg?height=552&width=1080)

迄今为止，她的INS粉丝也累计了44万6千的数量，也可以看到她经常会在社交媒体发布一些有关生活、身材的福利照片或者视频。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/g0-A-pcJl-l48-3_jHZxO.jpg?height=1443&width=1080)

再看另一位潮牌界蛮有名气的网红女博主，“你的渡口”，人送外号口子姐，无论是球鞋界还是潮流圈都一直有她的传说，也有相当一部分人被割过韭菜，所以她又来了。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nQf0DJy0OXGU-lQOpKRKQ.jpg?height=640&width=640)

这次是在数字藏品的全新领域。

今年五月份，她在nice App上发售了五套个人写真卡的数藏，总共5000套，发售价为59元，购买者需要满足nice App一系列条件。

自发售的这一个多月以来，单张数藏的价值曾高达2万元，不过最近的价格波动过大，截止发稿日，已经掉至1万元一枚。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GW6YeodI-RK_zMp6W6WP7.jpg?height=1583&width=1060)

但从App的数据上来看，依旧有很多人想要入手该女网红的数字藏品，可能是觉得还有升值的可能吧。

目前为止，世界上最大的NFT交易平台依旧是OpenSea，你从上面可以看到来自全世界各大组织制作贩卖的NFT元素，也能经常免费获得一些不错的空投。

而在国内，这一领域虽然还没有什么多大的动作，但是潮玩和一些比较简单的NFT就如同限量潮牌、球鞋那些，已经走上了一条不错的二级市场道路。

就像笑话一样，好像现在一定要带点颜色才是科技进步的源泉。

就好比人们对VR的发展更多会关心它到底能不能实现看片的实景环绕，国内部分数藏平台也是这样，只要能擦到边，就能立刻吸引到无论是看热闹的人还是有利想图的人。

\*\*不过，我还是对这个市场暂时的繁荣给予了相当的厚望。\*\*毕竟元宇宙一直在发展，充斥着虚拟现实的另一个世界终究会到来，只不过是时间和科技发展的问题。

**只希望，擦边的少一点，明明是可以百花齐放的新概念，就不要再走上“比心”的畸形路或者“陌陌2.0”的老路了。**

title: zkSync：如何找到不可替代的发展方向？
body:
**TL;DR**

1，zkSync处于发展初期，大量应用未上线，已上线应用以提供基础功能的DEX、DeFi、桥、基础设施、NFT为主。

2，zkSync 1.0定位为支付解决方案，2.0解决“可组合”问题，要获得突破性发展，zkSync需要找到不可替代的发展方向，也需要针对StarkWare构建差异化优势。

3，zkSync生态项目的原创性、创新性，下一阶段要实现的“隐私性”，可以成为zkSync的可拓展优势。

4，zkSync有比较大的可能成为10亿美元以上估值的独角兽。

以太坊Layer2相对于alt L1有着明显的安全性和去中心化优势。竞争公链经常被曝出宕机、安全事故，Layer2很少有这样的消息。

在所有Layer2中，ZK Rollup系的Layer2又是以太坊分支中最正统的。它在所有Layer2中最安全。而且随着交易人数的增加，每个人分摊到的交易费会降低，有比较好的扩容效果。

因为这些原因，ZK Rollup系Layer2广受支持。例如钱包项目Argent就曾表达过对ZK系的偏爱，Argent表示不会支持Optimistic Rollup生态，因为其将专注于ZK系的zkSync和StarkNet。

大家对ZK Rollup Layer2的期待主要寄托在zkSync和StarkWare上。哔哔News研究了这两个生态中的100多个项目，本文将解析zkSync生态的现状、特点、挑战、发展方向，以及未来展望。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BSkpXfmiCMSLLq5TnCaAV.png?height=819&width=1268)

*60个zkSync生态项目 来源：哔哔News*

**zkSync概况**

**1，简介**

zkSync是由Matter Labs开发的Layer2，采用ZK Rollup技术。zkSync最开始主打支付场景的扩容。因为gas费低，很多用户用zkSync 1.0做Gitcoin捐款。

2021年6月份，Matter Labs推出zkSync 2.0，致力于解决DAPP间的可组合问题，以及扩容效果的进一步提高。

就发展阶段而言，zkSync已经实现路线图中的“可拓展支付”、“智能合约”目标，现在官方专注于升级2.0版本（还在测试网阶段），对“智能合约”、“可组合性”的尝试应该会有更多努力和改进。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jrh7smMgTB70F1xr7OHLQ.png?height=166&width=600)

未来，zkSync将陆续解锁“隐私”和“去中心化”阶段。ZK Rollup的ZK（零知识证明）部分在隐私保护上有天然的优势，zkSync可以将这部分特性释放出来。而去中心化则意味着Matter Labs取消对zkSync的控制。

**2，融资信息**

Crunchbase显示，Matter Labs总共完成3轮融资（种子轮、A轮、B轮），共融到5800万美元。

3轮融资分别发生在2019年9月、2021年2月、2021年11月，其中Placeholder、1kx、Dragonfly Capital全程参与3轮融资，联合广场风投和a16z参与了2轮。这些风投圈的名字足以说明权威投资机构对zkSync的认可。

**3，链上数据**

**TVL：**5833万美元。其中ETH、稳定币是锁仓额主力军。zkSync生态的总锁仓价值在主流Layer2中处于中下水平。

**独立地址数：**超过33万个。zkSync独立地址数在Layer2中排名第二，仅次于Optimism，但是地址的日活跃比例非常低，目前只有0.04%左右。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/48V8gtWWx0YOjPpC6PIqN.png?height=646&width=935)

*来源：Dune Analytics*

近2周以来，zkSync生态平均每天只有几百个活跃地址，日交易数也只有几百笔，远低于Optimism 一天几万笔的水平。

这说明用户看好zkSync整体的发展，已经提前部署了zkSync地址，但是生态还没有发展到持续繁荣，用户日日交易的阶段。

**Gas费：**转账平均花费0.02美元，swap平均花费0.04美元。zkSync的gas费优势比较明显，交互成本大概只有以太坊主网的2%-5%。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/z5YSuuZPCd1XAe-T42u5G.png?height=605&width=668)

*Layer2 gas费对比 来源：l2fees.info*

zkSync各维度的数据，如生态项目数量、日交易量、TVL、协议收入等整体还比较骨感，主要是因为zkSync生态还处在发展初期，已上线项目不多。

**zkSync生态应用**

zkSync还处在发展的初期，这体现在生态应用维度上，主要表现为大量项目未上线，已上线项目以DeFi和基础设施应用为主，赛道比较局限。

根据统计，已经上线zkSync 1.0主网或者2.0测试网的非开发工具类项目不到40个。其中有7个和NFT有关，是NFT市场或者比较容易开发的NFT项目，有5个是预言机、浏览器这样的基础设施，4个是钱包，DeFi和DEX分别占到8席和4席。

**1，DEX**

哔哔News统计到的DEX项目有11个，其中只有4个已经上线主网或者测试网。

DEX项目以订单簿类DEX、AMM为主，两者的代表分别是Zigzag、Sat.is，以及CryptSwap、SyncSwap。DEX作为通证swap平台，既是生态刚需，在功能、协议收入、收益分配等维度上也已经有可参考模式，因此是zkSync生态中应用最多的赛道之一。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xx96KT0rf2RPxiIE3zF9u.png?height=290&width=1081)

*zkSync上已经可用的4个DEX 来源：哔哔News*

除了基础的通证swap功能外，DEX们也在拓展一些额外的功能，例如Zigzag支持跨链，SyncSwap支持稳定币封装、质押、治理，WardenSwap（未上线）提供NFT板块。

**2，DeFi**

DeFi是zkSync当前阶段最可探索的赛道。DeFi超越了基础的DEX场景，对于项目方而言有一定的创新余地。在借贷、投资组合管理、永续合约等方向上，也已经有一些案例供zkSync生态项目进行借鉴。

zkSync生态中，创新类DeFi项目有不少已经在其他网络部署，如专注于做稳定币收益的Gro Protocol、资管协议Babylon Finance。这些项目大部分在zkSync中处于未上线状态。

zkSync原生的DeFi应用如Mute.io、Trustless对DeFi的尝试主要围绕质押、农耕等基础功能。Increment致力于构建永续swap，是比较大胆的尝试，目前也还未上线。

DeFi也是最受投资机构青睐的赛道。哔哔News统计到的16个项目中，7个有融资信息，比例高于其他赛道。机构布局的DeFi项目大部分也处于未上线状态。

因此整体来看，zkSync上比较优质、有潜力，甚至杀手锏级别的项目还没有就位，生态处在爆发前夕。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cmaNP7IzDqKI5VR4BYiID.png?height=502&width=1117)

*获得机构投资的7个DeFi项目 来源：哔哔News*

**3，基础设施**

基础设施和钱包是机构热衷投资的另两大赛道。基础设施主要是ChainLink、The Graph等全链通用型基础设施。这些项目有非常高的网站访问量，体现出较高的使用率。

zkSync生态中的钱包与其他生态相比比较特殊。一些多链部署的通用型钱包如Coinbase Wallet在ZK Rollup系Layer2中并不适用。Argent是ZK Rollup系Layer2中最重要的钱包，并且为ZK Rollup系Layer2独有。

同样的特点也出现在跨链桥赛道。通用型的跨链桥如Hop、Multichain等在ZK Rollup系Layer2中也不适用。zkSync生态中主要使用Orbiter、LayerSwap作为跨链桥。

**zkSync生态特点和优势**

**1，大量项目未上线**

如前文多次提到的，zkSync生态中有大量项目处在未上线状态。已上线项目主要是一些提供基础功能的DAPP，如AMM、跨链桥、支持农耕和质押的DeFi、钱包等。

这与ZK Rollup系Layer2的开发难度有关。zkSync对以太坊的兼容程度不及Optimism和Arbitrum（zkSync 2.0测试网也兼容EVM，但并不是像OP、Arbitrum那样完全兼容或等同EVM），这导致以太坊生态中的项目迁移到zkSync存在阻力，项目要在zkSync部署难度比较大。

所以我们看到已经上线的项目比较少，并且赛道比较局限。哔哔News统计的60个项目中，已上线比例不到60%。

应用也主要位于DeFi、基础设施（钱包、桥、预言机等）、NFT市场和易于部署的NFT项目等赛道，像GameFi、SocialFi等开放性的赛道还比较贫瘠。

**2，原生应用较多**

EVM兼容程度较差也带来了zkSync生态的第二个特点，就是原生类项目比较多。在zkSync生态中，并未看到像Arbitrum、Optimism那样项目大量迁移自以太坊生态的情况。除了基础设施外，项目大多数为zkSync或者ZK Rollup原生。

这一方面导致DAPP间的可组合实现比较慢。另一方面也意味着项目部署有一定的技术门槛，部署到zkSync的项目一般都有比较强的技术能力。

相比于直接从以太坊迁移项目（或者抄袭开源代码做一个分叉版本）+项目间直接实现可嵌套可组合，zkSync生态中的项目被要求更加“自力更生”，这为创新提供了土壤。

在哔哔News统计的60个项目中，同时部署到ZK系和OP系的占比只有23%左右。而专门部署到zkSync（未部署到Arbitrum、Optimism、StarkWare）的项目占比接近50%。

ZK Rollup系Layer2有自己独立的钱包、桥系统，这是zkSync和StarkWare的共性。而在NFT、衍生品、DeFi（部分DeFi项目也在其他生态部署）领域，zkSync甚至相对于ZK Rollup系Layer2也表现出“与众不同”，有比较明显的生态独特性。

**zkSync估值**

目前对于zkSync的估值还没有明确的说法，但是以下数据可以提供一些参考意义。

StarkWare总融资额2.73亿美元，最新一轮融资1亿美元，估值80亿美元。

Arbitrum总融资额1.237亿美元，最新一轮融资1亿美元，估值12亿美元。

Optimism总融资额1.785亿美元，最新一轮融资1.5亿美元，估值16.5亿美元。

到目前为止，zkSync共完成5800万美元融资。作为Layer2赛道四大种子选手，以及长期来看更有潜力的ZK Rollup赛道的重要生态，zkSync凝聚着市场对ZK系Layer2发展的期望。无论是资金还是市场情绪，zkSync都有足够的支撑。

此外，zkSync还承诺会有生态原生通证，未来zkSync去中心化运作，用户通过质押通证可以成为网络验证者。这对市场有比较大的激励作用。

从以上维度来看，zkSync应该能发展成为十亿美元以上估值的独角兽。

**zkSync的挑战与未来展望**

zkSync面临的挑战主要来自alt L1和对EVM高兼容的Layer2。

竞争公链有充足的资金，并且因为运作比较中心化，带来了更好的用户体验。这些优势已经为竞争公链吸引了足够多的用户和资金。近几年Solana、Avalanche的发展我们有目共睹。但竞争公链宕机、安全事故频发，**安全性和去中心化是zkSync相对于竞争公链最大的优势。**

**在Layer2赛道中，短期来看，zkSync的主要竞争对手是Arbitrum和Optimism。长期来看，zkSync和StarkWare将在ZK Rollup系Layer2中角逐。**

Arbitrum和Optimism因为采用Optimistic Rollup，技术上比ZK Rollup更好实现，所以对以太坊的兼容，以及生态本身的发展都要快于zkSync。

Arbitrum和Optimism已经获得先发优势。两者生态中的项目、用户、交易数据都优于zkSync。而zkSync还卡在开发进展上。**ZK Rollup的技术难度是zkSync发展过程中的最大阻力。但是一旦克服，ZK系将爆发出优于OP系的潜力。**

**此外，zkSync也需要构建护城河，发展出生态特色。**正如Optimism强调公共物品发展，Arbitrum强调先发优势和生态激励，zkSync也需要找到不可替代的发展方向，或者应用赛道。

zkSync的初衷是提供低成本支付解决方案，并且获得了市场认可，很多用户通过zkSync 1.0参与Gitcoin捐赠。在支付场景中，zkSync还专门开发了zkSync Checkout工具，支持用户向不同收款人进行批量转账。因此，zkSync 1.0对于支付场景的定位非常明确，并且有效。

随着zkSync 2.0上线主网成为预期，zkSync的“可组合性”目标也被提上日程。在2.0测试网中，zkSync最大的特点是生态项目原生、独特、创新、高质。这些或许是可拓展优势。

未来，“隐私”也将被写进zkSync生态基因中。目前强调隐私属性的Layer2似乎只有Aztec。这也是一个可发展方向。

不过，这一切的前提是zkSync能够扩充生态，摆脱初期生态贫瘠的状况，补齐EVM兼容和DAPP可组合性上的短板。生态激励计划或许能提供帮助。

最后，同是ZK Rollup系的Layer2，StarkWare目前的发展数据优于zkSync，尤其是StarkEx的数据。**如何在ZK Rollup Layer2中构建差异化优势也是zkSync应该思考的问题。**

title: 这是一个广告，但你绝对用得上
body:
身处币圈的我们，总是频繁的跑动在各个交易所，有时候因为跟的项目在三四线交易所，我们不得不跻身进各类繁杂且没有安全保障的交易所，每一轮牛市都会涌现出一批交易所，做着各种各样的活动来吸引用户，联合野鸡项目方割用户韭菜，如果你在币圈待的足够久，那么你一定经历过或者看到过，这也是很多人都建议大家不要去小交易所，要去，就去头部交易所，不说三大所，最起码也得是排行榜前十的交易所，如果项目方执意要上线小交易所，那项目方的实力和动机就有待考究了。（鄙人甚至还碰到过项目方自己开一个交易所的，除了主流币就它一个项目的山寨币。）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lk5vp5jfU46mxKoLID07n.png?height=843&width=1114)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NtnGefQo6sgqEsB6fSsDa.png?height=784&width=1146)

光看图大家也能认得几个平时耳熟能详的交易所，币安，欧意，火币，库币，芝麻开门，抹茶，对吧，这都是平时很常见聊天就能看到的交易所，因为影响力足够大，所以安全也有一定的保障。

相信看到在这里，很多兄弟已经知道我要打什么广告了，虽然是一样的东西，但是我还是想让你知道点不一样的东西，建议看完全文，来都来了，总要带点知识离开不是吗？

大交易所和小交易所的区别，我相信大家都应该体会过。

**小交易所的弊端：**

单域名，访问会卡顿，延迟高，操作不流畅，容易错过机会。

提币困难，人工审核24小时不到最后一秒不打币，币丢了也没人管，客服长年潜水摸鱼。

深度极差，小币种价格区间巨大，非常影响交易体验，明明到了价格，但是就是买不到币。

不是实时挂单显示，而是智能交易。当你选择市价交易的时候，买到的价格远比你看到的价格低。

认证困难，随时有清退风险。

安全系数低（一个验证码即可上号转走所有资产）

等等……

还有很多就不一一列举。

**那很多人就要问了，小交易所这么垃圾，那为什么还有人要在上面玩呢，去大交易所不是更安全吗？**

**这个问题就问到点子上了，为什么很多人宁愿去小交易所被割韭菜，也不去大交易所呢？**

首先我们要明白一个道理，去小交易所，我们是去干什么的。

因为项目方在这个交易所上线，所以我们要去这个交易所变现吗？

是因为交易所提供了足够诱人的条件，所以我们去这个交易所常驻吗？

是因为小交易所有你想要买的币，所以才去小交易所的吗？

这些都可以成为你去小交易所的理由，去，没有关系，但是你要明白，你进去了，出的来吗？

我相信大家在币圈听到貔貅这个词，一种只进不出的神话动物形象，应该不陌生吧，玩一级市场冲过土狗的应该都知道，合约地址出来先去AVE上查一查是不是貔貅，丢没丢权限，池子锁没锁。

**貔貅，或许才是小交易所的最终目的。**

很多人这个时候要反驳我了，我现在玩的好好的呀，提现都是秒到呀，哪有你说的那么差。

我也想说一句，韭菜的成长需要时间，镰刀的挥舞，就一瞬间。

当交易所关门跑路的时候，你才反应过来的时候，已经晚了，币圈最忌讳的就是失去理智。

当你被小交易所的高额福利牵着鼻子走的时候，你已经是一只任人宰割的羔羊，被人宰掉只是人家挥刀的一瞬间。项目方指哪儿你们就冲哪儿的时候，也是同理。

**大交易所，难道就真的绝对安全吗？**

也不见得，但是目前大交易所，是最安全的地方，没有绝对安全的交易所，只是目前最好的交易所，当百分之80的人都选择了它，你又有什么理由不选择呢。

**那对比小交易所，大交易所有什么好处呢？**

安全，永远是币圈的第一位。没有什么比钱在自己手上更让人安心。

多个域名，不管你在国内还国外，都有专属地址以最优最快的速度访问交易所。

超快提币，大额极速审核，提币充币由链上自动确认。7\*24小时客服随时待命。

价格区间小，不存在无法完成交易或者价格到了 但是买不进的情况。这种情况只要人多就可以解决，小交易所人少，所以挂单和交易量少，但是价格又要对标大交易所稳定市场价格，导致了价格区间过大。

实时挂单显示，还有专门的标志标记你的挂单价格，可以让你在众多买卖单中一眼看到自己现在在什么地方，挂在那儿就买在哪儿，不存恶意加单拉你的价格。

认证简单，没有清退风险（已经清退过了，默认国人允许使用，持牌经营的大所有实力。）

安全系数极高，手机短信验证码、邮箱验证码、谷歌/专属验证器，三样缺少任意一样都无法动你的资产分毫。

等等…….

说了这么多，想必大家对于大交易所和小交易所的差距已经有了一定的了解，那么接下来咱们就步入正题。

**这次广告要推广的就是——币安。**

**各大虚拟币交易所排行榜位列第一。**

如果你没有币安，我建议你看完，如果你有币安，我更建议你看完（推荐是以新人为主没有错，但是币安老用户，你们确定自己的利益没有被人独吞吗？）

再此申明：该广告文仅作用的推广为注册币安的新用户，同时也为老用户解疑，仅此而已。

**很多人都知道，币安注册默认的返佣是20，但是你要注意，这个20，只给邀请者，也就是邀请你进入币安的伙伴，你是一点返佣都没有的。**

打个比方，我是返佣是20，我邀请了A进入币安，比如A买CBD的现货买了2000u，两小时涨了起来，卖了2500U，开了1000u的BTC合约，两个小时后BTC上涨500点平仓，等等，共计产生了10000u的交易量，也产生100u的手续费（这只是打个比方，具体多少要根据币安实际来算），这100u的手续费，有百分之20，也就是20u，是给我的，但是你没有份。

title: 交互式证明与零知识证明的认识论问题
body:
零知识证明是近期Web3行业非常火的概念，然而，什么是零知识证明（和交互证明）？近期读到一篇2008年的论文，Justin Bledin（现在供职于约翰霍普金斯大学）讨论了所谓的交互证明和零知识证明的认识论问题（epistemology），特别是它们可否被归类为一种数学意义上的“证明”，文章开头作者用一个很有趣的小故事来解释零知识证明：

> 一只猫给一只老鼠做了个迷宫，迷宫有南北两个入口/出口。
>
> 猫说：我的小老鼠，我打赌你不能穿越我的迷宫。如果你能，我就给你很多奶酪。如果不能，我就把你吃掉！
>
> 老鼠说：但是你是一只狡猾的猫。我怎么知道你的迷宫里有一条路可以穿越迷宫？证明给我看，我就接受你的挑战。
>
> 猫说：你太狡猾了！为了证明给你看，我必须给你指出一条穿过迷宫的路。那我们还有什么乐趣呢？
>
> 老鼠说：不一定。你可以把我丢在迷宫里的某个随机地点。然后我将随机选择北方或南方的出口，你将随机带我去那里。如果我们重复的次数够多，我就会相信这两个开口之间存在一条路。
>
> 猫说：嗯，这样你就还是不知道开口之间的路径，只是一个随机走到它们的集合。你好聪明！那我们就开始吧。

除了作者的这个小故事之外，其实我们可能用验证码的例子来解释更容易理解：网站会用一些找图片的机制来验证操作人员是真人还是机器人。比如一次成功验证有90%的概率可以确定操作者是真人，那么只要连续做足够多次（例如一百次），那就可以在统计学意义上认定操作者是真人。这样用户就不用在暴露个人隐私的情况下（例如开摄像头）向网站证明自己是真人了。因为这个过程存在着证明方（做题人）和验证方（出题人）两方，因此也就被称之为“交互式证明”。

但是这种证明和数学中的证明是一回事吗？如果是的话，那么我们对于数学体系的原有认知就会需遭到革命性的挑战，因为这种证据从性质上是一种“概率证据”（即便有99.999%的概率是真人，和那个人站在你面前说我是真人之间还是存在区别的）。只不过这种区别在日常生活中可以被近似掉，但是在理论世界中，这两种证明手段会存在认识论基础上的天差地别。因此作者在这篇文章里就讨论了这个问题，他不认为零知识证明会对数学理论带来多么“革命性的改变”。

这篇论文虽然包含了大量数学哲学、逻辑学、计算机科学（复杂性理论）的论述，但其大意是足够让普通读者理解的：即我们有必要对“零知识证明”的性质有清醒的认识，并且将它与传统的数学证明相区分。与1+1=2的数学证明不同，零知识证明可能更像是人与人之间的交流，就像在朋友圈里晒豪宅奢侈品——在不告诉其他人自己有多少钱的情况下，向周围人“证明”自己有钱的事实。

下面是该文的摘要与一些要点摘抄：

> 这篇文章探讨了关于交互式零知识证明的研究对哲学家在数学和理论计算机科学的认识论方面有什么启发（如果有的话）。尽管这种证明系统最初看起来是 "革命性的"，而且是一种非标准的 "证明 "概念，但我将论证它们并没有什么哲学意义。从这项工作中可能得到的对数学认识论的教训--我们的数学证明模型应该包括互动，我们的数学证据理论必须考虑概率证据，我们对数学证明的评价应该只关注其说服力--不是被误导就是老生常谈。虽然交互式证明和数学证明之间的差异表明，有必要为理论计算机科学，或至少是复杂性理论（complexity theory），发展一种不同于我们的数学知识理论的单独的认识论，但随便看看复杂性理论的实际做法就会发现，这样一种独特的认识论可能没有必要。

要点摘抄：

* 在2001年的时候，已经有学者（Goldreich等）作出大胆的预言，认为这种零知识/交互式的证明，会极大改变人类对于“证明”（这一人类文明最基本概念）的认识。
* “对于复杂性理论来说，典型的证明系统是 NP证明，它本质上是没有互动和随机性的互动证明。在一个 NP证明系统中，证明者只是隐含的，他们的一个信息必须是可以在多项式时间内确定地验证的。” *（Troyso 注：当一个决定性问题的解能在多项式时间内被验证时，则称此问题为NP问题。）*
* Goldreich一定程度上也承认：互动证明甚至不是非正式的数学证明。"定义交互式证明系统的动机并不是要取代数学证明的概念，而是要捕捉其他具有自然意义的证明形式。”在这里Goldreich所想到的更多是在动态社会环境中发现的“日常证明”，比如在法庭上经受住盘问（“证明”被告无罪)，或者在政治或科学领域的辩论。尽管我们可以把这些互动交流称为 "证明"，但我们并不是在任何数学上的相关意义上使用这个术语。
* 作者认为交互式证明系统可以在数学证据理论中发挥作用，例如发现反例或完成 “穷举证明”：“计算机已经越来越多地被用于所谓的 "实验数学"，特别是在测试和证伪开放的数学问题方面（例如，截至2008年2月，哥德巴赫猜想已经被Oliveira Silva验证为 n⩽11⋅1017）。检查此类猜想的特定实例与解决那些有交互式证明的算术问题并无不同。 尽管验证一般猜想的实例不能证明猜想的真实性，但计算机化的测试还是可以为我们提供猜想成立的证据，或者在某些情况下甚至可以引出一个反例。其次，计算机辅助的蛮力组合列举已经成为离散几何中的一种常见技术。“  
* “交互式证明可能是有缺陷的。如果一个交互式证明系统具有非零的可靠度误差（soundness error），那么一个成功的证明只能以高概率说服验证者相信其主张的真实性，而不是完全确定。\[…\] 与数学证明不同，数学证明在正确时会为前提和结论之间的牵连提供先验保证。“*（Troyso 注：所谓先验就是不依赖于经验而获得的认识，例如在我看到人生中第一次看到圆形的东西之前，我的脑海中可能已经知道圆形是什么样子的）*

文献来源：Justin Bledin, "Challenging epistemology: Interactive proofs and zero knowledge", Journal of Applied Logic, Volume 6, Issue 4, December 2008, Pages 490-501.

title: 交互式证明与零知识证明的认识论问题
body:
*（原创编译内容，如需转载请联系本人推特获得授权，所有权利保留）*

零知识证明是近期Web3行业非常火的概念，然而，什么是零知识证明（和交互证明）？近期读到一篇2008年的论文，Justin Bledin（现在供职于约翰霍普金斯大学）讨论了所谓的交互证明和零知识证明的认识论问题（epistemology），特别是它们可否被归类为一种数学意义上的“证明”，文章开头作者用一个很有趣的小故事来解释零知识证明：

> 一只猫给一只老鼠做了个迷宫，迷宫有南北两个入口/出口。
>
> 猫说：我的小老鼠，我打赌你不能穿越我的迷宫。如果你能，我就给你很多奶酪。如果不能，我就把你吃掉！
>
> 老鼠说：但是你是一只狡猾的猫。我怎么知道你的迷宫里有一条路可以穿越迷宫？证明给我看，我就接受你的挑战。
>
> 猫说：你太狡猾了！为了证明给你看，我必须给你指出一条穿过迷宫的路。那我们还有什么乐趣呢？
>
> 老鼠说：不一定。你可以把我丢在迷宫里的某个随机地点。然后我将随机选择北方或南方的出口，你将随机带我去那里。如果我们重复的次数够多，我就会相信这两个开口之间存在一条路。
>
> 猫说：嗯，这样你就还是不知道开口之间的路径，只是一个随机走到它们的集合。你好聪明！那我们就开始吧。

除了作者的这个小故事之外，其实我们可能用验证码的例子来解释更容易理解：网站会用一些找图片的机制来验证操作人员是真人还是机器人。比如一次成功验证有90%的概率可以确定操作者是真人，那么只要连续做足够多次（例如一百次），那就可以在统计学意义上认定操作者是真人。这样用户就不用在暴露个人隐私的情况下（例如开摄像头）向网站证明自己是真人了。因为这个过程存在着证明方（做题人）和验证方（出题人）两方，因此也就被称之为“交互式证明”。

但是这种证明和数学中的证明是一回事吗？如果是的话，那么我们对于数学体系的原有认知就会需遭到革命性的挑战，因为这种证据从性质上是一种“概率证据”（即便有99.999%的概率是真人，和那个人站在你面前说我是真人之间还是存在区别的）。只不过这种区别在日常生活中可以被近似掉，但是在理论世界中，这两种证明手段会存在认识论基础上的天差地别。因此作者在这篇文章里就讨论了这个问题，他不认为零知识证明会对数学理论带来多么“革命性的改变”。

这篇论文虽然包含了大量数学哲学、逻辑学、计算机科学（复杂性理论）的论述，但其大意是足够让普通读者理解的：即我们有必要对“零知识证明”的性质有清醒的认识，并且将它与传统的数学证明相区分。与1+1=2的数学证明不同，零知识证明可能更像是人与人之间的交流，就像在朋友圈里晒豪宅奢侈品——在不告诉其他人自己有多少钱的情况下，向周围人“证明”自己有钱的事实。

下面是该文的摘要与一些要点摘抄：

> 这篇文章探讨了关于交互式零知识证明的研究对哲学家在数学和理论计算机科学的认识论方面有什么启发（如果有的话）。尽管这种证明系统最初看起来是 "革命性的"，而且是一种非标准的 "证明 "概念，但我将论证它们并没有什么哲学意义。从这项工作中可能得到的对数学认识论的教训--我们的数学证明模型应该包括互动，我们的数学证据理论必须考虑概率证据，我们对数学证明的评价应该只关注其说服力--不是被误导就是老生常谈。虽然交互式证明和数学证明之间的差异表明，有必要为理论计算机科学，或至少是复杂性理论（complexity theory），发展一种不同于我们的数学知识理论的单独的认识论，但随便看看复杂性理论的实际做法就会发现，这样一种独特的认识论可能没有必要。

要点摘抄：

* 在2001年的时候，已经有学者（Goldreich等）作出大胆的预言，认为这种零知识/交互式的证明，会极大改变人类对于“证明”（这一人类文明最基本概念）的认识。

title: MetaBox: DataBox & ISP
body:
# Background

* In the complex and diverse blockchain world, users don't have a place that is entirely their own.
* There are too many wallet addresses to effectively locate your encrypted world identity, and also inconvenient for management.
* Users do not have the sovereignty over content distribution applications, but only the usage or governance rights.
* Users lack an available online (secure) terminal to manage their assets and data.
* In the Web3.0, where decentralization and ownership count, people do no have their own room. Nowadays, mainstream Web3 products are just the extension of platform economy, lacking true Web3 product around "ownership". Users do not have their own personal space guaranteed by smart contracts, let alone their own real DIDs. We aim to build a series of individual spaces with full ownerships. This space will provide services of different scenarios, such as socialfi, data-management, defi, NFT, etc.
* Users can own and manage their data and assets through MetaBox. Through data precipitation and asset self-management in Web3, MetaBox has become a tool for them to build their own DID.

# Product Introduction

MetaBox provides ***Boxes*** based on ***Box Protocol***. Here, you can create your Databox - self managed data box, personal data storage, which provides the functions of saving, acquiring and sharing files on the chain. At the same time, you can choose to encrypt and upload files to ensure the security of personal data.

We also develop ***ISP (IC Storage Protocol)***, providing ToB storage services, It is mainly for the project side. (It will be launched and illustrated in later articles. If your project is interested in learning further details in advance, please jump into the [discord](https://discord.gg/fzfmwSJh) and contact us!)

# Functional highlights

1. Box management

   1) Update Box name and its private/public state

   2) Comprehensive Box status management
2. Condition monitoring

   1) Display of MetaBox balances and storage usage

   2) The running state and storage amount of the created Box

   3) Top up cycles with ICP and XTC
3. File encryption

   1) AES key is generated locally and uploaded after file encryption. At the same time, the local key will encrypt the AES key again to ensure file security.

   2) When downloading the ciphertext, users can use the private key to decrypt the AES key, which will then be used to decrypt the ciphertext.

   3) The local key can be exported and reset. After resetting, it failed to open the encrypted file which is uploaded by the original key.
4. File sharing

   1) Through the generated URL, users can access, view and download files shared by other users.

   2) Through the public DataBox, users can directly access, view and download public files through the domain name.

# Architecture Diagram

Users can create and manage DataBoxes and Profile by logging in to MetaBox through II. Many DataBoxes can be created, but only one Profile can be created.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/22GVw-0k8QAzbyfy0rcA0.jpg?height=811&width=1122)

# Team

Mixlabs is a leading-edge technology laboratory in the blockchain direction composed of top universities and community developers in Asia. It is mainly engaged in cutting-edge technology research, incubation and ecological support around Web3.
